programme.desc: Phil Serrell and Anita Manning begin the day in Frodsham in Cheshire and end up at an auction in Easingwold in Yorkshire. Anita risks her lead by blowing her whole budget, but will she regret it?

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Anita Manning and Phil Serrell embark on the second-to-last leg and Anita's got some serious catching up to do. Their journey begins in the village of Amble in Northumberland and heads for an auction in Carlisle in Cumbria.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's the final leg for auctioneers Anita Manning and Phil Serrell as they kick off in their Fiat 500 from Castle Douglas in Kirkcudbrightshire and finish at a nail-biting final auction in Crooklands in the Lake District.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antique experts Christina Trevanion and Thomas Plant begin their Road Trip in the Republic of Ireland. Starting from Cashel, County Tipperary, in a 1962 Bedford van, they hunt for treasures to take to auction in Birr in County Offaly.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Traveling in their 1962 Bedford van, auctioneers Christina Trevanion and Thomas Plant shop their way through Ireland, from County Kildare to the Dublin, before heading over the Irish sea for their auction in the Welsh town of Wrexham.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Christina Trevanion and Thomas Plant continue their adventure in North Wales. Can Christina win the third leg in a row and hang on to her lead?

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's the penultimate leg for auctioneers Christina Trevanion and Thomas Plant as they shop around Warwickshire, Essex, and get treated to a spectacular Battle of Britain airshow. They then head for auction in Winchcombe, Gloucestershire.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's the final leg for Christina Trevanion and Thomas Plant. Starting in Gwersyllt in Wrexham, they meander through the border counties of North Wales and England, finishing up at their final auction in Stoke-on-Trent, Staffordshire.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Charlie Ross set Road Trip records the last time he was paired with James Braxton, but can he do it again? They set off from Boston and head to their first auction in the Norfolk town of Fakenham.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: In a Ford Zephyr, auctioneers Charlie Ross and James Braxton continue their hunt from the Lincolnshire town of Stamford, then travel east around Norfolk before ending up at an auction in the Cambridgeshire market town of St Ives.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Auctioneers Charlie Ross and James Braxton are half-way through their trip in their Ford Zephyr. This leg sets off from Shenton in Leicestershire and takes them to auction in the village of Bourne End, Buckinghamshire.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: In a return visit to Castle Ashby in Northamptonshire, Hugh Scully looks at some of the treasures of the house and introduces previously unseen items from other Roadshows, including a Cypriot vase that is 3,000 years old.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A book of Greyhound prints kept under a bed, early Worcester porcelain found at a car-boot sale, and a black iron umbrella stand are among the superb collection of antiques brought along by the enthusiastic public of this fine old town in North Wales.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: An old painting uncovered from behind layer upon layer of wallpaper and a watering can with holes in it are the surprising items that greet Hugh Scully and the experts when they visit Clacton-on-Sea, Essex.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A piece of Georgian furniture, a mahogany table with a secret drawer, and early lithographs of Halifax are among the finds on Hugh Scully's visit to the West Yorkshire town.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A wood-and-plaster model of a butcher's shop with an adjoining slaughterhouse, a painting of a World War I nurse, and a pair of Elizabethan scenes delight Hugh Scully and the experts when they travel to Reading, Berkshire.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Hugh Scully and the team visit Coleraine in Northern Ireland where they examine a valuable portrait belonging to a local cathedral, astonishing 18th-century calligraphy by a man born with no limbs, and a sundial found in a hedge.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: At the Lake District town of Keswick in Cumbria, finds include a 17th-century bleeding bowl that is now used to hold a potted plant, a bronze statue of four cowboys, and a set of six Merrymen Delftware plates kept in a biscuit tin.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Hugh Scully visits the Bowes Museum in County Durham to present unseen sequences from earlier editions. Featuring photos of celebrities of the 1950s and 60s, a gold badge from an order of chivalry, and an illuminated manuscript.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The first of two shows from the gardens of Penshurst Place, Kent, where finds include a valuable Scottish impressionist painting, a pair of fine candelabra, and a "book of friendship" containing a possible Jane Austen portrait.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The second of two shows from the gardens of Penshurst Place, Kent, where finds include a tin-plate toy boat, a rare paper toy and a pair of cufflinks by a famous French maker. This is also the last Antiques Roadshow featuring Hugh Scully

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Michael Aspel and the team are at Lichfield Cathedral in the Midlands. Amongst the items are a small statue thought to be from the tomb of Tutankhamun, an early Punch and Judy set and a sword pistol that belonged to Lord Nelson valued at GBP20,000.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The team head for mid-Wales where Michael Aspel and team unearth more intriguing finds including a bust of Dylan Thomas, an intricate book of early silhouettes, and a plate bought for £5 turns out to be worth £10,000.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The experts return to Edinburgh in search of Scottish treasure. Amongst the items are an early Mickey Mouse mascot, a rare deco figurine, and documents that once belonged to the bodyguard to Edward and Mrs. Simpson now valued at GBP15,000.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Can married people be friends with someone of the opposite sex without sex getting in the way? At what point does a friendly relationship become an affair of the heart or emotional infidelity? Meet Randy, who says his wife, Amanda, has crossed that line.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Former Subway spokesman Jared Fogle caught on tape. Listen to the shocking, never-before-heard audio recordings. Former journalist Rochelle Herman-Walrond secretly taped the pitchman for years as part of the FBI's investigation. Pt. 1

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Jennifer says son, Alex, 12, is addicted to violent video games, spending 20 hours straight killing people in an online gaming world; she fears it may be a catalyst for him to become the next school shooter. Shocking home video of his violent behaviors.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Melissa, 26, left home without warning & flew 2,000 miles across the country, leaving behind a note that said, "One day, Dr. Phil will be able to help me." The family says she hadn't "been herself." Melissa says she's ready to tell why she vanished.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Horrific allegations are tearing a family apart. Todd, ex girlfriend Latia & mom Diana tell their versions of sexual misconduct. Todd says he will do anything to prove his innocence. Dr. Phil calls in a polygraph examiner, with shocking results.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Connie wrote Dr. Phil for help, concerned for her grandchildren. Jennifer's daughter drank bleach from her sippy cup when she was 3 and was found with a backpack of maggots, mold and rotten milk at 7. Dr. Phil delves into Jennifer's history as a parent.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Do you ever wonder how your favorite Dr. Phil guest is faring since being on the show? Dr. Phil follows up with some of his most talked about guests.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Are you ignoring warning signs in your relationship? Is there something concerning you that you haven't addressed? Dr. Phil warns his viewers: Don't think your problems will go away once you walk down the aisle, face the issues now before it's too late!

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: The disappearance of Connecticut mom of 5, Jennifer Dulos has captivated the media. Dr. Phil's team of experts analyze circumstances surrounding her disappearance, including Jennifer Dulos' estranged husband, Fotis, & his girlfriend, Michelle Troconis.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil goes into his mailbag to answer viewers' popular questions! He has help from commedienne and author Teresa Strasser. When Teresa talks to moms on the street, find out their biggest parenting and pregnancy queries. Update on Ted Williams.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Misti says her mother, Lisa, is a "raging alcoholic" failing rehab 3 times and was arrested and charged with her third DUI just days before. Lisa says she's not an alcoholic, just a person who likes to drink. Can Dr. Phil give Lisa a reality check?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil welcomes controversial YouTuber "Agent Sebastian" who runs a page called "Cart Narcs" posting hundreds of explosive videos apprehending shoppers in parking lots who do not return their carts to the corrals. Is "Agent Sebastian" breaking the law?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: A father pleads for help regarding his missing daughter. Gabby Petito, 22, set off on a van trip with her fiancé, but two months later he returned alone. Police revealed the couple had an incident--caught on camera. Gabby's dad is determined to find her.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Author Dr. Philip Zimbardo, The Lucifer Effect: Understanding How Good People Turn Evil, and Dr. Phil examined what makes a good person do bad things. They continue to explore blind obedience to authority & an eye-opening experiment on group conformity.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Drew and Ross Mathews are covering today's hottest topics like why Cher says she shouldn't be called an icon and the recent opinion piece on tipping that has people debating.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: A con artist pretends to be someone from back home and stays with the Clampetts. She plans to get photos of Jed in a compromising position in order to blackmail him.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro decides to sophisticate Emaline, but she has bigger plans for blackmailing Mr. Drysdale with her cuckoo clock camera. The colonel continues to woo Granny. The two swindlers though haven't met someone as sharp as Jed.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro is chopping wood while a chimpanzee named May Bell watches. He wishes that he could teach May Bell to chop wood. When Elly May comes by, she and Jethro talk and decide that they want a gorilla.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts miss Herbie and ask Mr. Drysdale to get the tame gorilla back. The banker promises to help, but actually hinders the effort.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny's soap making sends noxious smoke into the air, which gets the attention of smog commissioner Tinsley. He shuts down the operation, and Jed decides to run against him when he misunderstands Mr. Drysdale's advice.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed takes a job on the board of directors of O.K. Oil Company.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro is so desperate to meet a woman that when Miss Hathaway's bird watching group arrives, he goes out of his way to try to impress the women.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: In order to buy Mrs. Drysdale a special Christmas present, the Clampetts take seasonal jobs in a department store.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny discovers Martians next door at the Drysdale mansion.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny decides to take her share of the Clampett millions and move back home.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed and Granny decide to donate the burden of their millions to some college students and move back home.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: When Crowfoot Indians come to Beverly Hills to discuss a boundary dispute at the Clampett oil field, Granny prepares for war.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: After reading the Society page, Granny decides the best way to get Elly a husband is to throw her a coming out party, complete with possum burgers and gopher gravy. Mrs. Drysdale, hoping to forever humiliate them, is all too happy to help.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampketts come across Narda and Yerko, two gypsies, who decide to run a scam on the unsuspecting clan. Involving both a marriage prophecy and a curse, the crooks see the families' naivety to their advantage.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts are visited by a real king, Alexander, so Granny and Mrs. Drysdale start matchmaking. The broke royal needs a wealthy bride and courts Ellie. Drysdale niece Doreen is tricked by a costumed Jethro and ends up unimpressed.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts acquire a hippopotamus when an advertising scheme originated by banker Drysdale backfires.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Banker Milburn 'Drysdale's precocious 11-year-old nephew swindles the hillbillies of all the valuable art objects in their mansion.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed Clampett has inherited a castle in the English countryside. Jethro insists that everyone, except Granny, wear the royal raiment's of Elizabeth (the First, of course).

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts head to England to visit the castle Jed inherited. Misunderstandings abound, from Jethro mistaking San Francisco for London, to the impounding of Granny's medical supplies, to the real intentions of the elderly chemist.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts finally make it to their new castle and try to adjust to the English way of castle life, at the least the way Jethro thinks it is, based on his understanding of English myths and legends.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: When Jethro gets his draft notice, Jed decides he should pay what it costs the Army to train inductees. When Mr. Drysdale hears this, he starts figuring how he can get Jethro out on a Section 8.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro reports to the induction center after getting his draft notice. The Army isn't quite sure what to make of Jethro.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Since Granny can't plant crops in their yard, Jed thinks the solution is to buy her a plot a land somewhere else. He figures a place called Happy Acres is the best spot to buy land, not realizing it's a cemetery.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro thinks he wants to be a naval frogman, but Granny is concerned her tonic has transformed him. Mr. Drysdale, concerned about finances, has Miss Jane distract Jethro with comics, causing him to want to fly to the moon.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro heads down to the Reserves HQ while wearing an ancestor's Confederate Army uniform. The Sergeant thinks he's an actor there to participate in a Civil War reenactment. Jethro runs home to tell Granny the Civil War is still on.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Col. Blake asks the actor playing Gen. Grant to play along with Granny so that the Civil War movie can continue. Meanwhile, Jethro uses his 6th grade education to take the written test to enter the Reserves.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro believes his moment for Hollywood stardom has arrived. Casting for Bachelor Sheriff Knows Best is occurring, and Jethro mistakenly thinks he has been chosen.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E021) The drama and the stakes rise as the West Beverly High crew gets ready for their Spring Dance.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E001) Summer is here, and Brandon breaks the news to Nat that he is quitting his job at The Peach Pit.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E002) Brandon sets his eyes on an older Beach Club worker, whose mysterious secrets make her even more appealing to him.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E003) Dylan, injured in a surfing incident, stays with the Walshes during his recovery - until Jim Walsh kicks him out for kissing Brenda!

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E004) After an illegal late-night poker game, Brandon and Dylan clash over a break-in at the beach club.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E005) Kelly is mortified when her mother starts dating David's father and plots to break up the new couple.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E007) The gang heads up to Yosemite on what turns out to be a totally doomed camping trip.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E009) An effort to create a neighborhood security patrol goes horribly awry resulting in race hate and violence.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E010) When Dylan's long-absent mother moves back into his life - not to mention into his home - things come to a head, forcing Dylan to confront his issues not only with his mother, but with himself as well.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E011) Brandon and Brenda's paraplegic cousin Bobby is visiting Beverly Hills - and Kelly finds him extremely interesting!

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E012) Andrea wins a high-school journalism contest, but her victory is marred by a school district investigation.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E013) The gang goes to a Halloween party, but things take a turn for the worst when Kelly's seductive costume catches the eye of a college student whose intentions are less than honorable.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E015) Emily invites everyone to a secret party at an underground club - where she does something that could end her relationship with Brandon forever.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S02E016) Emily refuses to accept the fact that Brandon no longer wants to see her and spirals out of control - and Brenda's the only one who might be able to talk her down.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Will Blue be blindsided and sent to Jury? And which Houseguest will leave second? Because it's Double Eviction night, baby! A crazy, unpredictable, and heart pounding week's worth of gameplay, all in one night.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Tonight see all the begging, pleading, and strategizing that you didn't see durning the double; and with only five remaining winning Head of Household is more important than ever. Plus, two more house guests will hit the hot seat.

When Mary can't solve daughter Brenda's boy problems, Brenda enlists the aid of an expert -- Mary's nemesis, Sandra, their sultry, sexy and 'man-wise' neighbor.

Young Calvin's unemployment has gotten everyone at '227' so concerned that 'always-involved' Mary badgers husband Lester into hiring him--but when Lester is forced to fire the awkward teenager, the residents explode.

After Mary's refrigerator breaks down, her sly and opportunistic neighbor Sandra readily agrees to use her 'influence' on their stingy landlord to get her a new one--in exchange for Mary lending her apartment to Sandra for one of her 'small gatherings.'

Mary Jenkins, the irrepressible meddler and protector of '227' gives honesty a beating after she backs into a neighbor's parked car and then calls upon her 'man-wise' nemesis Sandra to use her feminine wiles to calm the handsome man's anger.
Mary fires Cupid's arrow at her brother Lewis and best friend Rose, but she misses the mark when Lewis sets his own sights on resident vamp Sandra.
Brenda's genealogy assignment triggers a war between her mother Mary and neighbor Sandra over famous ancestors--but Mary's pride soon goes AWOL when she learns her family tree has root rot.

programme.title: Sanford and Son
programme.desc: Lamont discovers that the porcelain figure he has bought is worth a great deal of money and decides auctioning off the piece will bring the best price. Fred's actions as a shill backfire, shattering Lamont's chance for freedom...and the statue.

programme.title: Sanford and Son

programme.title: Sanford and Son

programme.title: Sanford and Son

When Mary can't solve daughter Brenda's boy problems, Brenda enlists the aid of an expert -- Mary's nemesis, Sandra, their sultry, sexy and 'man-wise' neighbor.

Young Calvin's unemployment has gotten everyone at '227' so concerned that 'always-involved' Mary badgers husband Lester into hiring him--but when Lester is forced to fire the awkward teenager, the residents explode.

After Mary's refrigerator breaks down, her sly and opportunistic neighbor Sandra readily agrees to use her 'influence' on their stingy landlord to get her a new one--in exchange for Mary lending her apartment to Sandra for one of her 'small gatherings.'

Both Mary and Sandra get a different view of womanhood when housewife Mary attempts to rekindle lost love by 'steppin' out' with husband Lester, while party-happy Sandra is homebound with her six-year-old niece for the weekend.
Everyone's abuzz when the 'birds and the bees' invade '227,' but Brenda and Calvin may wind up getting stung when Mary discovers their secret rendezvous.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: El equipo de NCIS investiga el accidente de tránsito de un Marine y desata algunos tristes recuerdos de Abby cuando era una niña en búsqueda de rastros para resolver su "primer caso".

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: El equipo de NCIS atrapa a un reconocido pirata informático que puede darles la llave para encontrar al mayor ciber terrorista del mundo.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: El Director Vance, aún de luto por la pérdida de su mujer y la madre de sus hijos, descubre inesperada información personal que le generará dudas sobre absolutamente todo.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): A sangre fría
programme.desc: Cuando un teniente de la policía de Nueva York, recientemente retirado y bien considerado, es acusado de disparar a un grupo de posibles asaltantes en el metro y posteriormente desaparece, Frank debe enfrentar las consecuencias.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): El camino al infierno
programme.desc: Danny debe determinar quién asesinó a un hombre cuando varias mujeres que trabajaron para él se atribuyen el mérito.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Un nuevo comienzo
programme.desc: Erin se siente abrumada por la culpa después de que un hombre al que liberó es acusado de matar a un policía.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Ayúdame a ayudarte
programme.desc: Linda pide a Danny y Báez que ayuden a su compañera de trabajo, quien está teniendo problemas con su exmarido enfurecido.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC ayuda a la hija periodista de Rossi, Joy (Amber Stevens West), a investigar la desaparición de una alumna de la universidad.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC está persiguiendo a un sospechoso en Phoenix que está secuestrando víctimas con insomnio. Además, Hotch y García se enfrentan a la amenaza del grupo de sicarios clandestinos, llamados“La docena sucia.”

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Tras la muerte de dos agentes encubiertos de la DEA y la desaparición de un tercero, el UAC se suma a la NSA para investigar si una red clandestina de drogas por Internet está involucrada.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: UAC está buscando a un sospechoso que tal vez esté fascinado por inquietantes experimentos médicos.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Luego de un evento que acontece cerca de casa, el equipo de NCIS se une para buscar respuestas y pedir justicia en pos de proteger a los colegas más vulnerables.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: The power of the beards invades the Broken Skull Challenge as eight tough-as-nails male athletes compete in Snatch, Stacked and Chained up for a chance to win $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Eight new women come to the Broken Skull Challenge to go head to head in Snatch, Stacked and Chained Up. The winner goes on to get a shot at Steve's Skullbuster and his $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Fresh meat go head to head at the Broken Skull Challenge as eight new men take on Possession, Loaded and the Grip & Rip to try and prove they are the toughest badass in the country and take home $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Eight new women arrive at the ranch to fight head to head in Possession, Loaded and Grip & Rip to earn a spot in Steve Austin's Skullbuster and a shot to win $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Eight new male competitors go through three grueling rounds of competition, including Drag Race, Bagged, and Blowout. One of them will earn the right to take on the Skullbuster, and a chance at $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Steve Austin brings in his toughest group of women yet to compete in Drag Race, Bagged, and Blowout. Only one will earn the right to take on his Skullbuster and a chance to win $10,000.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: The last group of elite male athletes comes to Steve Austin's ranch in search of the $10,000 prize. After battling through Trench Warfare, Pain Train and Barreled, only one will have a shot at the Skullbuster.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: It's the final episode and Steve Austin has saved his best for last. Who will go home with the $10,000 grand prize? Find out on the Broken Skull Challenge.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: Steve Austin brings back 12 seasoned Redneck Island veterans and 12 eager new rookies to battle it out for $100,000. At the first challenge, the players dive into the competition as they fight it out to claim victory.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: The game is turned on its head as one player quits the competition and another is seriously injured. The challenge turns physical as the teams fight to stay afloat.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: The players must rise to the occasion as a daunting challenge pushes their limits to new heights. One of the veterans gets life-changing news from home. A powerful new alliance forms that changes the course of the game.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: A budding romance between two teammates complicates their future in the game. The challenge forces the competitors to put their brains as well as their brawn to the test.

programme.title: Redneck Island
programme.desc: The power continues to shift in the game, raising the stakes to a new high as the teams brawl it out at the challenge. Old romantic flames reignite between Margaret and Josh.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 06/09/2013. Anthony Bourdain visits Congo, the setting of one of his favorite books, Conrad’s “Heart of Darkness.”

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 09/22/2013. Anthony Bourdain visits Andalucia during Semana Santa, Holy Week, to visit longtime director Zach Zamboni, who currently lives in Granada.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 04/14/2013. Anthony Bourdain explores one of the most fabled and beautiful areas of Asia: Myanmar, the city of Yangon and the remote Bagan temple.

programme.title: United Shades of America
programme.desc: Aired 6/2/2019. Kamau visits Salt Lake City, Utah, to explore the growing LGBTQ+ community living in the epicenter of the Mormon religion.

programme.title: United Shades of America
programme.desc: Aired 6/9/2019. Kamau visits Milwaukee, WI--the most segregated city in America--to better understand why living while black can be so challenging

programme.title: United Shades of America
programme.desc: Aired 6/16/2019. Kamau visits Philadelphia and Chester, Pennsylvania to learn about the toxic man-made disasters that have polluted these communities for generations.

programme.title: United Shades of America
programme.desc: Aired 4/28/2019. Kamau visits Dallas, TX - the home of the Megachurch, to find out what is creating the new face of Christianity today, in a city where church and state are far from separate.

programme.title: United Shades of America
programme.desc: Aired 5/5/2019. While in and around Seattle, Kamau takes a look at different forms of activism that white people are using to combat America’s history of white supremacy and the rise of extreme right wing groups across the country.

programme.title: United Shades of America
programme.desc: Aired 5/12/2019. Kamau meets members of the Hmong community brought here after the Secret War forced their expulsion from Laos and learns the multi generational stories of loss, perseverance and hope that make up their American journey.

programme.title: United Shades of America
programme.desc: Aired 5/19/2019. Kamau visits Jackson, MS to explore the divisive world of reproductive rights and reproductive justice including abortion, sex education, and women’s health.

programme.title: United Shades of America
programme.desc: Aired 5/26/2019. Kamau takes a look at Washington D.C. through the eyes of the city’s residents who show him the vibrant culture of D.C. that is distinct from the Washington politics that surround it.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 04/21/2013. Anthony Bourdain visits Koreatown in Los Angeles, where he finds a tight-knit community marked by the 1992 Rodney King riots.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 04/28/2013. Colombia has changed immensely over the past 10 years. Anthony Bourdain explores several regions of the country, from the mountains down to the Caribbean coast.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 05/05/2013. Chefs and restauranteurs Fred Morin and Dave McMillan, of Joe Beef’s, take us across Canada by rail.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 05/12/2013. Anthony Bourdain explores the "Interzone,” where artists like Burroughs, Bowles and the Rolling Stones sought escape from Western moral prohibitions.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 05/19/2013. Anthony Bourdain explores Libyan hip-hop, Italian restaurants and post-war uncertainty, by examining the country through personal stories, food and music.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Parts Unknown
programme.desc: Aired 06/02/2013. Bourdain and his friend, world-renowned chef Eric Ripert, move from hip, modern Lima back in time into pre-Columbian Peru.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A cyclist sends officers on a frantic foot-chase through a neighborhood, and when searching a building, police find a woman hiding in a cupboard.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A decoy vehicle is strategically abandoned in a public parking lot. An officer responds to a burglary in progress call at a local tire store. Officers respond to a domestic call at a nearby trailer park.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A stolen U-Haul is seized during a felony traffic stop. An unfaithful husband is caught hiding his mistress in the bathroom. Police assist an individual who is going through self-discovery.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: During a traffic stop, a driver drops off his passenger before speeding away. Deputies are amazed when a man offers them an ID that looks nothing like him. Deputies investigate a case of road rage involving a gun.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A distressed woman leads the cops to her abusive fiance, and a couple of officers are suspicious when they pull over an overly friendly man.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Recovery of a stolen vehicle uncovers a weapon and a lengthy criminal history. Detectives cross paths with a car that was stolen in a carjacking. Officers speak with a man who has questionable standards regarding gun safety.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An officer on street patrol chases down a suspect on foot, an alleged car thief posts his exploits on Facebook, and a crashed stolen car may not have been stolen after all.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A daring driver takes officers on a wild ride, a man offers a bizarre excuse for the items found in his car, and a man is arrested after threatening his neighbor with a gun.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A wanted suspect tries to hide from officers, a woman calls deputies to apprehend her hostile husband, and a passenger tries to outrun the police during a traffic stop.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man in New Jersey is arrested for possession. A couple is pulled over while driving around a known drug zone looking to score and the boyfriend is arrested for an outstanding warrant. A routine traffic stop turns into a fruitful drug bust.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man leads Officers on a pursuit across county lines. An Officer assists in an undercover sting to capture drug dealers. An Officer finds a gun in a suspects car.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An officer subdues a young man in mental duress before paramedics arrive to treat him. Officers stop a suspicious vehicle and find drug paraphernalia inside the woman's car. Officers respond to a robbery in progress.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A skittish driver’s decision results in a trip to the hospital. A car full of young men swear they were trying to escape an imminent threat. An innocent woman struggles with the decision to press charges on her friend.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man is arrested for stealing a large amount of copper wire from a business owner. A young man on a bicycle is charged with possession of drug paraphernalia and public intoxication. A man whose tags expired by a few years is pulled over.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A disoriented suspect would rather take a shower than comply with officers, a stolen vehicle sting nets a surprisingly young driver, and a traffic stop leads to a drug arrest.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man tries to jump out of a car when his friend takes him on a high-speed chase, and a deputy investigates a man he finds walking down a dark road.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A parolee leads deputies on a high-speed chase, police respond to a domestic disturbance call, and an officer helps frustrated citizens settle their differences.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A K-9 unit assists on a motorcycle pursuit turned foot chase gone awry. Officers investigate after noticing the garage door to an auto body shop is open. A pursuit involving a stolen vehicle driving on the wrong side of the freeway ends with an arrest.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A defiant motorist is shocked when his mother sides with the law, and deputies discover a man wearing a bizarre costume during a routine traffic stop.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers give chase to a suspect on a bike. A vehicle is pulled over and a passenger is arrested for possession of drug paraphernalia. Police are given a classic "I'm holding it for a friend" excuse.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers step in when a man's erratic behavior sparks concern in a neighborhood, and a wanted suspect is convinced an officer told him to take off on his bicycle.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A sibling reluctantly called authorities when his belligerent brother refused to leave his mother's home. Officers respond to a shoplifting call at a local grocery store. Officers investigate a suspicious vehicle parked at a local gas station.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A driver leaves her car during a routine traffic stop, officers stop a car that appears to have fake tags, and police respond to an altercation between a father and son.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A dangerous high-speed pursuit quickly comes to a head after the driver loses control. In Florida a man is pulled over in a stolen vehicle and asserts the car belongs to his parents. Arrests are made in a Florida prostitute sting.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man apologizes profusely after leading an officer on a foot chase, a passenger in a car chase tells conflicting tales, and police find a wanted man on a roof.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers respond to a call that a man shot up his parents' house, a fleeing suspect hopes a change of clothes will fool the police, and a shaky hit-and-run story unravels.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers dress a naked man who is causing a disturbance, a barefoot man denies evading police, and an intoxicated woman and her husband tell two different stories.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates two unusual cases, one involving the suspicious death of a go-cart racer who took his hobby to the highway and paid the price with his life, and a murder at a hip new restaurant where patrons dine in the dark.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSI team investigates the murder of an entire family, except for one daughter, who supposedly is possessed by the devil.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and his team discover a young man strangled to death by hanging ...whose body looks like that of a woman.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The CSI team goes behind the scenes at a horror porn film studio to investigate the murder of a slasher film actress murdered on the set of one of her movies.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: In Part One of a Two-Part crossover episode to conclude on Without A Trace, a kidnap victim from New York who went missing six years ago may be the same boy whose death Grissom and the CSI team are investigating in Las Vegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A suspect from Sara's past returns, causing her to question her future as a CSI.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Warrick's addiction to pills begins to impact his job when his investigation into the underground mob in Vegas results in him being targeted as the prime suspect in a mob-related murder case.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Hodges has ulterior motives when he stages hypothetical murders in the lab to give his colleagues a chance to play CSI.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and his team delve into the world of illegal dog fighting to find out who is responsible for the death of a wealthy socialite.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and his team investigate two murders that take place at the annual bull riding rodeo in Las Vegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and his team battle the flu when they are called upon by DDA Klein to investigate the deaths of several key witnesses for a grand jury case against a dangerous Las Vegas gang.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The disturbing death of a 3-year-old girl has a great impact on Catherine as she searches for clues to her murder.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Brass and Nick get help from an unlikely source, an incarcerated criminal (Method Man), when investigating two murders that take place in the same apartment building.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom and his team discover several victims who have green blood, leading them to the conclusion that their deaths are somehow connected.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: La adicción de Warrick a las pastillas empieza a afectar a su trabajo cuando su investigación sobre la mafia clandestina de Las Vegas le convierte en el principal sospechoso de un asesinato relacionado con la mafia.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Hodges tiene segundas intenciones cuando escenifica hipotéticos asesinatos en el laboratorio para dar a sus colegas la oportunidad de jugar a ser CSI.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y su equipo se adentran en el mundo de las peleas ilegales de perros para averiguar quién es el responsable de la muerte de una acaudalada dama de la alta sociedad.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y su equipo investigan dos asesinatos que tienen lugar en el rodeo anual de monta de toros de Las Vegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y su equipo luchan contra la gripe cuando el fiscal Klein les pide que investiguen la muerte de varios testigos clave para un caso del gran jurado contra una peligrosa banda de Las Vegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: La inquietante muerte de una niña de 3 años tiene un gran impacto en Catherine mientras busca pistas sobre su asesinato.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Brass y Nick reciben ayuda de una fuente poco probable, un criminal encarcelado (Method Man), cuando investigan dos asesinatos que tienen lugar en el mismo edificio de apartamentos.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y su equipo descubren varias víctimas que tienen sangre verde, lo que les lleva a la conclusión de que sus muertes están conectadas de algún modo.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y el equipo de CSI se ven envueltos en el mundo de la comedia de Hollywood cuando una diva de las comedias de situación (Sagal) muere prematuramente durante el rodaje de su programa en Las Vegas.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Warrick es acusado de asesinar a un famoso gángster de Las Vegas e incluso él no está seguro de su culpabilidad o inocencia.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Gil Grissom es el supervisor del turno de noche de los investigadores de élite de la escena del crimen de Las Vegas. Holly Gribbs, recién salida de la academia, se une al equipo.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Un hombre es asesinado después de haber ganado una fortuna y haber dejado a su novia. Entonces, Grissom, Nick y la recién llegada al equipo de CSI, Sara Sidle, investigan este caso.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom, Nick y Sara buscan a una mujer secuestrada y encuentran más de lo que esperaban. Catherine y Warrick investigan la muerte por atropello con fuga de una niña.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom y Catherine investigan la aparición de una pierna cortada de un cuerpo en un lago. Mientras tanto, Sara y Nick investigan un juramento de fraternidad que ha salido terriblemente mal.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When one of the CSI's biggest enemies is murdered, Horatio must determine which of his team members is a suspect.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Megan Donner returns to the CSI unit in time to work on a jet crash in the Everglades. They discover a victim five miles from the crash.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: After fishermen catch a tiger shark and discover a partial human torso in its stomach, evidence leads the team to suspect murder.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a rape and a murder takes place on a Miami beach, Horatio and the team are sent to investigate the mansion of the Hamilton family.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When his mentor is killed while defusing a bomb, Horatio goes on a personal mission to find the culprit. Megan wonders if he is too close to the case.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a priest is murdered, Horatio and the team must investigate. A lip print on a drinking glass sets a 12-year-old altar boy as a prime suspect.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A 5-year-old girl is murdered at a restaurant/playland catering to parents and children, and Horatio and the team must investigate.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and the team investigate the murder of a male stripper found dead after a female sex party. Evidence suggests he had sex prior to his death.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When a family is slaughtered in their home, Horatio and the team try to find the killer with the evidence left at the scene.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Three people are shot and killed in downtown Miami during rush hour and Horatio and the team must catch the killer fast.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A professor from a local university is found hanging from a tree after being tortured, she had been tortured for at least 4 hours before the hanging.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When an unidentified girl is found dead near a very strict rehabilitation camp, Horatio and the team investigate her murder.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio and the team are called to investigate when a prostitute is found stabbed to death and stuffed under a bed after the body was cleaned.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: When it's revealed that a ring of underground labs are manufacturing deadly drugs, Horatio and Speedle investigate the situation.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: El estilo de vida de los ricos y famosos está bajo el microscopio de Horatio y el equipo de CSI cuando la niñera de una familia adinerada aparece muerta.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando una ametralladora rara e ilegal evapora a tres contrabandistas de armas, el equipo de CSI debe encontrar al asesino antes de que el arma cause más muertes.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: La ex de Horatio, y madre de Kyle, resurge en Miami como la viuda de un multimillonario que hará cualquier cosa para recuperar a su hijo.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Mientras investigan el asesinato de una mujer, el equipo de CSI descubre un laboratorio de metanfetamina en su apartamento y a un agente del FBI sin escrúpulos con una vida secreta propia.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio y el equipo de CSI investigan un asesinato en una boda, las pistas finalmente llevan a los CSI a un club de striptease local.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: El pasado de Horatio vuelve para perseguirlo cuando Julia lo arresta por asesinato. El equipo de CSI debe investigar para absolverlo.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio enfrenta fantasmas de su pasado, el equipo corre contra el tiempo para salvar a Calleigh de un grupo de peligrosos secuestradores.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio y el equipo de CSI deben actuar rápidamente para detener a un justiciero que ha causado una ola de asesinatos contra depredadores de Internet.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Un cuerpo en un sumidero lleva a Horatio y al equipo de CSI a un robo, mientras investigan, descubren que el objetivo guarda un secreto impactante.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando el hijo de Alexx se convierte en sospechoso de asesinato, salvarlo tiene terribles consecuencias. Horatio y el equipo de CSI deben actuar para absolverlo.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando un hombre muere debido a una llamada falsa a Emergencias, Horatio debe enfrentarse a un investigador privado que está destruyendo sistemáticamente al equipo.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando alguien está decidido a destruir a Horatio y al equipo de CSI, Horatio arriesga su vida para salvar a su personal.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI no se detendrá ante nada para encontrar a quién le disparó a Horatio, la evidencia los lleva a algunas de las personas más peligrosas de Miami.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Cuando la gasolina se vuelve tan cara que los residentes de Miami matan por ella, el equipo de CSI se enfrenta cara a cara con una de las redes criminales más sádicas de la ciudad.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Danny and Lindsay explore the worlds of goth and glam when a young girl that belongs to the underground “suicide girls” cult is found dead.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A young hotel employee falls to her death from a hotel rooftop after she becomes embroiled in a deal with a scheming top model.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac is summoned from a night at the opera to a bloody crime scene. Across town, a famous bachelor is found dead in his swim gym.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: When a paintball player is found shot to death, Flack realizes that a dirty cop under his supervision could be to blame.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: After a night of heavy partying two underage girls make the reckless decision to drive home. In route, the girls get into an accident.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and Flack investigate the death of a parachute professional whose chute was pelted with dead pigeons causing him to plummet to the ground.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: When Hawkes is framed for shooting a bartender and then later sent to prison, the team takes to the street to set their investigator free.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and Stella work with a deaf family to find their daughter’s killer. The team investigates the murder of a young skating sensation.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: When a rich real estate agent is found dead in a brownstone, Mac and Stella work with evidence that suggests he was either a kidnapper or kidnapee.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Danny and Mac find a corpse in a salt truck which is then later identified to be a high-powered extreme sports executive.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: When a college student is found dead in a maze at the Queen’s county farm museum, the CSIs discover a cult-like fraternity with harsh punishments.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac investigates the death of a girl found in a bathtub filled with rose petals. Stella questions the death of a man who fell in his fish tank.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and Danny investigate a case in which a delusional ex-con is found dead in his home while lying on top of a bed of cash.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The team investigates a case in which magic-trick inspired murders occur including a woman being cut in half while in a wooden box.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Presa (S5 Ep20)
programme.desc: Mientras investiga la muerte a tiros de un hombre en un teatro vacío, Stella se da cuenta de que la escena del crimen es extrañamente familiar y planeada.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Pasado, presente y homicidio (S5 Ep21)
programme.desc: Cuando un hombre muere al caer del piso 52 y su cuerpo desaparece después de tocar el suelo, el equipo de CSI debe tratar este caso como la desaparición de una persona.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Aniversario luctuoso (S5 Ep22)
programme.desc: La subasta de joyas más exclusiva del año termina abruptamente cuando asesinan a un tasador durante el evento. Hay un cambio emocional en la investigación.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Un bien mayor (S5 Ep23)
programme.desc: Mac le informa a un ex convicto que cumplió condena por un crimen que no cometió y Anna le dice a Danny que es hora de que nazca el primer bebé del equipo de CSI.

programme.title: CSI: New York: La verdad me engaña (S5 Ep24)
programme.desc: Stella descubre que los neoyorquinos están siendo asesinados por artefactos griegos antiguos, ella entrega su placa para seguir una pista que la lleva a Grecia.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Págale (S5 Ep25)
programme.desc: Al trasladar al hijo de Robert Dunbrook de la cárcel al tribunal, un grupo de secuestradores profesionales embosca a la policía de Nueva York.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Epílogo (S6 Ep 1)
programme.desc: La vida de un miembro del equipo de CSI de Nueva York cambia para siempre de manera significativa después de un tiroteo.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Lista negra (Presentando al sepulturero) (S6 Ep 2)
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI de Nueva York está rastreando a un asesino cibernético que actualmente amenaza la vida de varios trabajadores de la salud.

programme.title: CSI: New York: El asesino de la soga (S6 Ep 3)
programme.desc: Esta semana, el equipo de CSI de Nueva York está buscando a un asesino en serie que tiene un sentido de orientación increíblemente letal.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Muerte reconocida (S6 Ep 4)
programme.desc: El equipo de CSI de Nueva York descubre ADN que contradice un caso de asesinato que antes era aparentemente sencillo.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando encuentran muerta a la esposa de un dentista bien conocido, la policía se esfuerza por identificar a un sospechoso. Algunas fibras y un estudio de los patrones climáticos en la noche del asesinato abren el caso y revelan al asesino.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En la víspera de Navidad de 2005, se encuentra el cuerpo de un hombre ardiendo cerca de Baltimore. Finalmente fue identificado como Wesley Person, de 26 años.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Después de inspeccionar el daño de una tormenta en un hogar en Tampa, un asesor de seguros simplemente desapareció. Treinta horas después, su cuerpo apareció en un río cercano. Pero el asesino había sido descuidado.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando un joven bombero murió de lo que parecía ser una enfermedad cardíaca grave pero no diagnosticada, su familia y amigos quedaron devastados, pero no tenían pruebas de algún juego sucio.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En el 2002, el director de la funeraria, Lonnie Turner, fue encontrado muerto a tiros. Su hijo, Lonnie júnior, se convirtió en el principal sospechoso, particularmente después de que se descubriera que el asesinato se cometió con su arma.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1996, la policía de Virginia Beach llegó al departamento de Makdessi para encontrar los cuerpos ensangrentados de Elise Makdessi y de Quincy Brown, un soldado de la Marina. ¿Pero era el amante de Elise o su agresor?

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Por lo general, es fácil determinar cómo un criminal entró en la escena del crimen. Pero en este caso, estaba lejos de esclarecerse. Parecía que el asesino se desvaneció y quizá lo hizo.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1992, Laura Houghteling desapareció de su casa en Bethesda y nunca más se la volvió a ver. Los científicos forenses usan evidencia de su habitación para dirigir a la policía hacia un sospechoso principal.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Uno para llevar
programme.desc: Una pareja casada decidió escapar del frío del invierno con unas minivacaciones en Key West.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Placas y mentiras
programme.desc: Un estudiante universitario fue encontrado muerto y la evidencia sugirió que conocía a su asesino.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Una fría noche de Diciembre de 1993, Rose Larner se detuvo en una tienda cuando se dirigía a la casa de su novio. Nunca más se la vio ni se supo de ella.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: El pensamiento rápido de un investigador lo ayuda a capturar una huella de zapato hecha en la nieve antes de que la evidencia se desvanezca.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 2003, Tiffany Rowell y tres de sus amigas fueron brutalmente asesinadas en la adinerada área de Clear Lake, Texas.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: La investigación sobre un brutal ataque a dos niños cerca de un estanque se basa en pruebas extraídas de las aguas turbias. Fue el primer caso en el que se utilizó evidencia de Diatomea (algas) para ubicar a un sospechoso en la escena del crimen.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1992, Dawn Bruce, de 22 años, es brutalmente asesinada en su apartamento de Virginia. Los investigadores notan una mancha de sangre en la funda de una almohada que parece haber sido hecha por uno de los dedos del asesino.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En el año 2000, Judy Southern llegó a casa del trabajo y recibió un disparo de un hombre armado que esperaba dentro. Su esposo llegó poco después, llamó a los servicios de emergencia y la llevó al hospital.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un bebé es trasladado urgentemente a la sala de emergencias con problemas respiratorios graves. En meses, hay más de 30 casos similares. ¿Pueden los médicos encontrar la causa y la cura?

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Evidencia del Jefe
programme.desc: Se detalla el asesinato en Seattle de 1996 de la pareja suburbana Raquel Rivera y Jay Johnson. La evidencia del perro, Chief, de la pareja finalmente vincula a uno de los asesinos a la escena.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un rastro de un asesinato se esfuma, hasta que la policía recibe un llamado de una mujer cuyo esposo, Gerald Powers, tenía un pasado criminal y una afición por los Chevy Berettas.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Matan a un hombre joven en un misterioso accidente vehicular, pero la evidencia en la escena lleva a los investigadores a creer que no fue un accidente. La ciencia forense reveló lo que pasó realmente y la verdad es devastadora para tres familias.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Entre 1985 y 1988, 18 personas fueron asfixiadas, abusadas sexualmente y dadas por muertas en las remotas montañas de California.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Cuando se calma el agua
programme.desc: Un dirigente sindical es ejecutado en su casa poco después de una huelga de los miembros del sindicato. Ni su esposa ni nadie en el vecindario escuchó ningún disparo.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: La hija de Paul Gruber sospechaba que algo malo estaba ocurriendo cuando recibió unas tarjetas de regalo enviadas de parte de su padre, pero escritas con la letra de una persona extraña.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: La víctima había sido agredida sexualmente y apuñalada hasta la muerte en la playa. Se descubrió un par de zapatos de tenis de hombre cerca de su cuerpo.

programme.desc: South Dakota's Jade Delaney believes in the power of positive thinking, and she has a vision board to prove it.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: With 26 sealed briefcases full of varying amounts of cash, ranging from a penny to $1m – contestants decide whether to accept an offer of cash from ‘the Banker,’ in exchange for what might be contained in the contestant’s chosen briefcase.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Loveable high school choir director Bryce Gage has big dreams for his small town of Marble Falls, TX.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: The contestant picks one case which is theirs to keep. As each of the 25 cases is opened, the likelihood of the player having a valuable cash amount in their case decreases or increases, with ‘the Banker’ tempting the player throughout the game.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Double the deals, double the drama-with bowling champion Kyera Chandler and then elementary school "princi-PAL" Carri Nevad.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: With 26 sealed briefcases full of varying amounts of cash, ranging from a penny to $1m – contestants decide whether to accept an offer of cash from ‘the Banker,’ in exchange for what might be contained in the contestant’s chosen briefcase.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: With 26 sealed briefcases full of varying amounts of cash, ranging from a penny to $1m – contestants decide whether to accept an offer of cash from ‘the Banker,’ in exchange for what might be contained in the contestant’s chosen briefcase.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: As summer comes to an end, Becky tries to understand the meaning behind an unexpected tragedy.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After the devastating loss of Adam, the Degrassi students try their best to move on but when it's your brother… And fitting in is hard for Zoë because she's never just been a normal girl. Alli reunites with Leo on her home turf.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Drew does his best as Degrassi President but without sleep, he's not much good. By Drew's side, Zoë becomes the first lady of Degrassi. Leo does damage control and tries to get in with Alli's friends.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The opportunity to write for a real-life magazine is offered to Clare but her brain after cancer is not cooperating.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Clare tries to concoct any excuse to save her reputation with the magazine but doesn’t want to play the cancer card.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Focusing more on her music than Miles, Maya lets Zoë talk her into making a sexy music video.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Miles helps Maya discover who is behind her video going viral. Maya's hellbent on revenge, getting her into hot water.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Student council prez Drew is psyched about his Degrassi TV interview but when the story sheds a negative light, Drew’s stunned.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Drew is excited to have Bianca back in town for Thanksgiving but is surprised when she isn't as forthcoming as he expected.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s Alli’s birthday, but all she can think about is Leo being sent back to France.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Alli is still lying to protect Leo, but her stories are beginning to unravel. Maya shows her rubber room classmates that she isn’t a princess.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Drew attempts juggling his new job and his new girl. To forget about Leo, Alli focusses on her science experiment. After getting thrown out of class for forgetting to wear a bra, Imogen plans a scathing piece for Degrassi TV.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Failing at balancing his life, Drew decides he has to break up with Zoë. Alli partners up with Dallas in an attempt to stay focused on her science experiment. Imogen takes her dress code fight online, but what does she really want to achieve?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: A shocking discovery leads Miles to question his family life. Eli is slipping away, and Clare finds herself growing closer to Drew. Dallas wants to be with Alli, but the truth about her relationship with Leo could send him over the edge.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Miles is determined to out his father’s secrets, but he may not be ready for the whole truth.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: With rumours swirling about Zoë’s drunken adventures at a recent party, Becky files a DTV report about teen girls and alcohol.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Becky wants to put things right after making a false accusation about Zoë's assault. But once she discovers the truth and sees how deeply this is affecting everyone, Becky questions if she's doing the right thing.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Maya tries to help Zig out of a tough situation. Jenna sets her sights on winning the semi-formal king and queen crowns with Connor. Becky worries she will lose Imogen as a friend when new student Jack arrives.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Becky tries to get back in bestie rhythm with Imogen at the semi-formal, but is there more to their relationship than friendship?

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Dallas feels he's being racially profiled after he and Connor are held for questioning in connection with a terror incident.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Tristan confronts Mr. Yates about his harsh Drama class criticisms and finds out the shocking truth behind them.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When Zoë lands her dream role, it hits a little too close to home following her assault. Clare has some tough decisions to make as she searches for a date to Wild Wild West Night. Miles focuses on settling the score with Zig.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Fireworks begin at Wild Wild West Night when Clare makes her decision known with regards to Drew and Eli. Zoë struggles to stand up for herself. Miles and Zig face off in a showdown for Maya's heart.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Maya is doing her best to keep Zig safe but when she snoops and finds a bag of drugs, her worst fears are confirmed. Winston is on the prowl for his first ladyfriend when he realizes the perfect girl has been right under his nose for years.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Hiding Zig out at the Matlin house while the Maya organizes the Art Night seems to be working… for now. But will she be able to keep the gang away? Clare is deparate for answers from Drew.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Becky feels isolated at home since helping turn in her brother. Looking for a distraction, she finds her escape in online gaming. Drew’s excited for the last days of the Hollingsworth campaign but his charm gets him more than he bargained for.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Drew is in trouble! He was fired from the campaign, his friends think he’s a home-wrecker, and he’s even in a fight with Dallas.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Rick decides to get back at his bullies, hitting them right where it hurts – their cars. But when Jimmy becomes a member of the “Whack Your Brain” team, the two form a truce.
