programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: The world's biggest beasts have always captured the imagination, but whilst being big can have its advantages, it also comes with sizeable challenges. The Komodo dragon's huge appetite means it must take on prey ten times its weight.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The life of the first reptilian carnivores on Earth, told through computer animation.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The Jurassic period saw the advent of the largest and strongest dinosaurs that ever roamed the Earth.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: A look at the world as it was 149 million years ago - in the late Jurassic Period. The old continents have broken up and much of the land is under water. Huge shallow seas have supported a revolution in marine life.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: With wings longer than those of a small plane, pterosaurs were the largest creatures ever known to have flown.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: This programme looks at the Cretaceous period, 106 million years ago. Volcanic activity forces the continents apart, and dinosaurs diversify into a range of species to cope with environmental extremes.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: It is the late Cretaceous period and Tyrannosaurus rex is the top predator, but the Earth is poisoned by volcanic activity and a comet strikes.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: It is only in recent years that experts have unearthed the biggest dinosaurs that ever lived. One monster eclipsed all others, more than seven times as heavy as diplodocus was the immense argentinosaurus.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: A new generation of carnivores was about to take killing to the next level. At the end of the Cretaceous period, these new hunter killers had spread throughout the globe.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: A look at bizarre dinosaurs such as the curious buck-toothed Exipdexipteryx, the amazing four-winged Microraptor and the pot-bellied Nothronychus.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: In 2000, scientists made a groundbreaking discovery, explaining how birds evolved from dinosaurs. However, a deeper investigation put a question mark over everything.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Exploring a dinosaur graveyard in Patagonia to gain a better understanding of dinosaur evolution, particularly the Middle Jurassic period when they became gigantic.

programme.title: Living with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: David Attenborough learns that descendants of the dinosaur age are alive and well. David explores how they survived the catastrophes that wiped out other species.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Exploring the newfound remains of a dinosaur species considered the biggest carnivore in history, all while posing the question whether they engaged in a fight against the Argentinasaurus.

programme.title: Attenborough and the Giant Dinosaur
programme.desc: David Attenborough tells the story of the discovery and reconstruction in Argentina of the world's largest known dinosaur, a brand new species of titanosaur. Measuring 37m long, it now holds the record as the biggest animal ever to walk the earth.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Steve is going large as he focuses on the biggest animals to have ever walked the earth. In his dino-den, he starts by meeting the Argentinosaurus, an animal so large that even its poo was deadly.

programme.title: Deadly Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The Jurassic was home to the most vicious and violent predators the world has ever seen. To survive, herbivores had to fight back. Steve Backshall goes on a mission to track down the deadliest of all dinosaur defenders.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Invasion of Time
programme.desc: The Doctor orders K9 to lower the Gallifrey's defences.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Invasion of Time
programme.desc: The Doctor is accused of betrayal when the Vardans invade Gallifrey.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Invasion of Time
programme.desc: As the Vardans materialise on Gallifrey, the Doctor prepares to spring his trap.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Invasion of Time
programme.desc: The Sontarans attempt to take full control of Gallifrey.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Invasion of Time
programme.desc: A dangerous game of hide and seek begins inside the TARDIS when the Sontarans get in.

programme.title: Doctor Who: City of Death
programme.desc: While on holiday in Paris, the Doctor and Romana experience time distortion.

programme.title: Doctor Who: City of Death
programme.desc: Scarlioni is planning to steal the Mona Lisa. Yet he has six in his cellar - all genuine.

programme.title: Doctor Who: City of Death
programme.desc: Count Scarlioni is really Scaroth, last of the Jagaroth.

programme.title: Doctor Who: City of Death
programme.desc: Scaroth intends to travel back in time to save his own people from destruction.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Shada
programme.desc: Chris Parsons is happily engrossed in studying post-graduate physics at Cambridge, when one day he finds an old book, sitting on a dusty shelf in an ageing professor's library.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Logopolis
programme.desc: To repair the TARDIS's chameleon circuit, the Doctor goes to Earth for a real police box.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Logopolis
programme.desc: The Doctor travels to Logopolis where a series of fateful events are set in motion.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Logopolis
programme.desc: The Master is loose on Logopolis and is determined to learn the planet's secret.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Logopolis
programme.desc: With the fate of the universe at stake, the Doctor and the Master must collaborate.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Castrovalva
programme.desc: The Doctor tries to recuperate within the Zero Room, leaving Nyssa, Adric, and Tegan to face the Master. Then Adric is taken, and the TARDIS plunges towards Event One.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Castrovalva
programme.desc: The Zero Room is gone, and the Doctor’s regeneration is unstable. To help him, Tegan locates the tranquil world of Castrovalva and the TARDIS heads there.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Castrovalva
programme.desc: Something is wrong with Castrovalva, but the Portreeve cannot help the Doctor identify the problem. And the Master is taunting Adric, caught in his web of power.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Castrovalva
programme.desc: As recursive occlusion threatens to destroy everything and everyone in Castrovalva, the Master’s space/time trap is revealed, with Adric at its heart.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Black Orchid
programme.desc: A murder is committed in Cranleigh Hall. The Cranleighs ask the Doctor to play cricket and then join them for a masked ball, enabling the killer to hide in plain sight.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Black Orchid
programme.desc: The Doctor stands accused, despite Lady Cranleigh knowing he is innocent. What is the secret she is protecting that allows her to let an honest man go to jail?

programme.title: Doctor Who: Earthshock
programme.desc: Silent but deadly androids are protecting a bomb buried beneath the Earth.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Earthshock
programme.desc: With her crew slowly vanishing, Briggs assumes the Doctor to be the guilty party.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A mail carrier learns to thwart dog attacks; two Pomeranians attack each other when left alone; a Swiss mountain dog is aggressive around food.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A miniature schnauzer compulsively spins in circles; four French bulldogs do not listen to their owner; a mixed breed has a leash tied so tightly it has to be surgically removed.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar Milan is called in to help singer Patti LaBelle who is afraid of her own guard dog and a teacher who wants to unify her dog's dual personalities.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A ridgeback mix has eccentricities; a Jack Russell terrier attacks motorcycles; a border collie's herding instincts get the best of him.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An Australian shepherd is too dedicated to its owner; a beagle mix lashes out at anyone who walks past; an Italian mastiff fears cars.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A puppy terrorizes its owner's cat; a spoiled Yorkshire terrier; a Rottweiler is aggressive toward strangers.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An Italian greyhound mix is possessive over bones and toys; a mastiff misbehaves outside; a Yorkshire terrier takes over her owner's morning routine.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An unpredictably aggressive Kerry blue terrier; two territorial Maltese dogs who are close to being banned from the retirement home where they live; a bloodhound/Catahoula mix who attacks her canine companion.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar visits Tijuana, Mexico, to team up with volunteers from United Hope for Animals, an organization that rescues dogs and finds them U.S. homes; a cocker spaniel taunts her owner.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A golden retriever mix with canine aggression; a bearded collie who barks, howls and scratches at her owner's boyfriend's guitar; a Lhasa apso/Cavalier Kind Charles Spaniel with canine aggression.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar tries to restore peace at an apartment complex where the residents' dogs do not get along; a family has trouble controlling its three dogs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An American Eskimo dog attacks doors and windows whenever people pass; a shiba inu overprotects his corgi playmate; two bulldogs are aggressive.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Expert Cesar Millan rehabilitates dogs with behavioral issues.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar Millan helps an overly aggressive German shepherd and a timid rat terrier.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: The cameras are turned around, as we get a tour of life "behind the scenes" on Dog the Bounty Hunter. Using interviews with Dog and the posse, the TV crew, and never before seen footage, this is one of most revealing and heartfelt episodes of the series.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: This fugitive spells trouble for Dog in today's hunt. When the leads grow cold, it's the US Postal Service to the rescue as a mail carrier lends a helping hand. Dog's team surrounds the suspected safe house and silently awaits their prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today's case involves a Samoan, so Dog knows that the runner's close-knit kinfolk holds the keys to bringing him in. Dog's plan is to convince the family that everyone is best served if the fugitive mans up and takes care of business.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's target for today was once an upstanding member of his community. Now with no home, no job, and the law on his trail, this middle-aged exile from middle-class society is using the cold end of an ice pipe to soothe his troubled soul.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: New series focusing on the tumultuous home and professional life of bounty hunter Dwayne "Dog" Chapman, and his partner and wife Beth. In the first episode, Dog and team chase Floyd Chapman (no relation), a heavily tattooed bail jumper.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: In Hawaii, Dog sets off from Honolulu to Kona to help his son Leland with some of his fugitives. First, a stop at Leland's boxing gym to warm up for their day of hunting with a quick sparring session and some father-and-son time together.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog decides to liven things up with a competition. He and Beth will hunt for one fugitive, while Leland and Justin chase another. The winner will be the duo that captures its fugitive first. Will Dog keep bragging rights as the Best Bounty Hunter in

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Once a criminal himself, Dog knows how it feels to be hunted. In this episode, Dog and the team delve into the depths of Honolulu's Chinatown as they search for a young Samoan girl who's gone down the wrong path. After a frustrating day of hunting, D

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: While hunting an elusive deep sea fisherman, Dog is also trying to plan a great Mother's Day for Beth, but he's having problems finding the special flowers Beth wants.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is hunting a man known as The Godfather of Waikiki. Dog and Beth bailed him out as a courtesy, but now he is refusing to go to court. If Dog doesn't bring him in, it could cost him more than money; he may lose his respect on the street.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog has a big problem. Patty Estabilio has jumped a $15,000 bail bond and disappeared into Hawaii's underworld. Kissing the kids good night, Dog and Beth, with Tim and Leland at their side, plunge into a drug-infused netherworld.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Justin is the low man on the totem pole in the Chapman clan, and this means that the rest of the team is always teasing him. But Justin wants to be a full-fledged member of the team, and Dog has a fugitive that will be his test case.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and his team return to their roots, with a visit to their home town of Denver. Dog and Tim begin the day with an early morning radio show appearance, and it pays off when a listener calls in with a tip about one of the fugitives they're hunting.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Back in Denver Dog discovers that recapturing the past can be more difficult then tracking down felons. On a day of more misses then hits in their fugitive hunting, Dog and Beth repeatedly collide with reminders of their early days.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog hunts down Chris, a fugitive wanted on drug charges. Dog turns over every rock, but to no avail. Later, they decides to revoke the bonds they holds on Chris's mother and stepfather because they've violated the conditions of their own bonds.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog goes after Virginia, a hard-to-find lawbreaker. He gets a tip that a pickup truck will be going to Virginia's house. In true private-eye fashion, the team tails the truck in two SUVs, regularly switching the follow car to throw off their scent.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog decides to sweep the island clean of as many fugitives as he can in two days. Raymond, wanted on drug charges, is an easy grab. Mauro, wanted for solicitation, is busted. And a Samoan, Siamau, is convinced to fly back to Hawaii from L.A.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog goes after a fugitive named Tracy who lives in a homeless shelter, but the shelter's staff is uncooperative, and the two sides get into an angry confrontation that forces Dog to temporarily back off.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog juggles his job and family responsibilities at the same time. He leads the search for Robert, a low-level drug dealer. As he hunts down Robert, Dog gets on the phone to tell Beth not to spend too much money to furnish Leland's Honolulu apartment.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Upset because one his puppies may die and wanting to give the little guy a second chance in life, Dog decides to offer one of the fugitives a second chance, too. He captures Paul, a meth addict, then steers him to a rehab program instead of jail.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and his team are out to revoke bail on Eugene, a chronic heroin addict. They find him in a squalid apartment with a huge stockpile of syringes, and they can see that his physical condition is deteriorating.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and his team fight the war on ice-crystal methamphetamine-on many fronts. They appear on a special anti-drug float in a parade. Then they go after bail-jumping Pana, a convicted drug dealer.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Hunting down a fugitive known as "Bozo," Dog gets help from an unexpected source, Bozo's father-in-law.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the team get a big surprise after they track down Bosco, a fugitive who they believe is addicted to methamphetamines. They discover he's off drugs, settling into a normal life with a new girlfriend, and is very friendly.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Leland has a full plate of fugitives in Kona, and the whole family heads to the Big Island to help.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog visits his mother's grave for inspiration before heading out to find Frankie, a violent fugitive hiding in the jungle. The spirit of Ma Chapman seems to help when Dog finds an unusual ally; Frankie's mother.

programme.title: Going To the Dogs
programme.desc: January marks the start of a new season on the dog show circuit.

programme.title: Lost And Found
programme.desc: Following the work of Dogs Trust, one of Britain's best-loved dog rescue charities, as they find new homes for unwanted and abandoned dogs.

programme.title: Lost And Found
programme.desc: Following the work of Dogs Trust, one of Britain's best-loved dog rescue charities, as they find new homes for unwanted and abandoned dogs.

programme.title: The Dog Rescuers
programme.desc: At an address in the Wirral, Inspector Anthony Joynes finds two collie crosses, Patch and Socks. Both dogs are in very poor condition and Anthony needs to get them out.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Peter is struggling to find his feet in his new practice. But when a farmer rushes in with a heavily pregnant sheep who's struggling to give birth, instinct takes over as Peter deals with the emergency.

programme.title: Funniest Pets & People
programme.desc: Dog sucks thumb; dog sitting in bowl; Pomeranian dog has itchy butt; cat climbs up side of TV.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Star, a 3-legged sheep, might be given a new lease of life if Matt can fit her with a prosthetic leg. Julian meets Teddy, a 10-month-old dachshund and his owner Kerry, who believes Teddy saved her life when she went into cardiac arrest.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Julian races to an emergency at a local farm where a cow is unable to stand up. She's suffering from a condition called milk fever, caused by calcium deficiency.

programme.title: Animals Unleashed
programme.desc: A recycling dog, a cat tumbles off the ironing board, and a Pitbull meets some curious cows. And in our Top 5, a cat faces off against a grocery bag.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Peter rushes into Skeldale on his day off to try and save Richard Bell's lamb, who was badly injured when he was born just a few hours ago. And at Suzanne Benson's trekking centre, Julian's treating a very poorly one-week old llama called Noah.

programme.title: Lost And Found
programme.desc: Following the work of Dogs Trust, one of Britain's best-loved dog rescue charities, as they find new homes for unwanted and abandoned dogs.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: In this episode, Julian treats a much-loved moggie with a badly swollen eye where surgery might be the only option. Head Nurse Sarah is extremely worried about her own dog, Copper, who is off his food, losing weight, and going downhill fastest.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Peter heads back to the Teasdales' farm where he recently delivered a healthy calf. But this time the pressure is really on, as the expectant mum belongs to Ian's young son, Alfie.

programme.title: To The Rescue
programme.desc: Tommy highlights Corridor Rescue and Emancipet's efforts in Houston to provide care and homes for stray dogs, focusing on the rescue of an abandoned dog, Gray, demonstrating the challenging yet rewarding process of animal rescue.

programme.title: 2019 AKC National All-Breed Puppy and Junior Stakes
programme.desc: Watch America's only All-Breed Puppy Show, from the National Championships in Orlando, Florida.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Kirby's attempt to kill Alexis is unsuccessful, and Alexis promises to remain silent if Kirby will leave Adam; Sammy Jo reveals the culprit behind Claudia's mystery calls; Fallon is gripped with a seizure and drives off as her wedding is about to begin.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Following a serious traffic accident, Fallon mysteriously vanishes. Dex and Steven bail Alexis out of jail. Sammy Jo attempts to seduce Adam. Alexis flatters Adam by suggesting he work with her defense attorney, Warren Ballard.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Steven accuses Adam of conspiring with Sammy Jo to kidnap Danny. Blake arranges to take out a mortgage on the mansion. He little suspects Alexis has signed the note and will become the owner if he defaults.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: To secure financing for his bankrupt company, Blake arranges to see Billy Waite, a notoriously underhanded oil man. Jeff continues his search for Fallon. Impatient with the progress her lawyer is making on her defense, Alexis fires Warren Ballard.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: In Seattle, Jeff and Blake learn the woman who died in the plane crash with Peter DeVilbis cannot be positively identified, but the ring she was wearing is indeed Fallon's wedding band. Back in Denver, Fallon's moving funeral is held.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake visits Dominique at La Mirage to discuss her recent revelation. She tells Blake that her mother was a long-time mistress of his father and has evidence to prove it. At Alexis' trial, a neighbor offers powerful evidence that incriminates Alexis.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: On the witness stand, Steven testified he saw Alexis push Mark to his death. Jeff sees other women in an attempt to forget Fallon but remains obsessed with his ex-wife. Alexis takes the stand and testifies.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Adam and Dex vow to prove Alexis' innocence and begin a determined campaign. The woman who testified she had seen Alexis on the terrace with Mark had hosted a party that evening and snapped photographs.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Amanda insists Alexis acknowledge their relationship and begs her to reveal her father's identity. Alexis tells her it was simply an anonymous ski instructor in Gstaad. Steven and Alexis reconcile.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake offers to help Amanda find her father. Claudia goes out with Dean to dinner, while Steven rejects Luke. Jeff ends up sleeping with Nicole. Dominique goes to Istanbul to meet with Rashid Ahmed.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Krystle goes into premature labor and delivers a baby girl, who suffers from respiratory problems. She names the child Kristina after a friend who once saved her life. Claudia is uneasy when Steven accompanies Luke on a business trip.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Upon learning that he may be Amanda's father, Blake resolves to ask Amanda to take a blood test. Nicole tells Jeff there's a chance Peter DeVilbis may have been with another woman at the time of the crash.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake buys back his racehorse Allegre from owner Daniel Reece, who sends Krystle a gift. Furious, she demands to know how he dared approach her after what happened with her sister, Iris. Amanda learns she is Blake's daughter.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Krystle reconciles with Daniel, who reveals that his break-up with her sister was amicable. Claudia moves into La Mirage. Krystle confides to Steven that Daniel is Sammy Jo's father and therefore little Danny's grandfather.

programme.title: Sharks, Scavengers of the Seas
programme.desc: Before being an earthly paradise with enchanting colours, the lagoon of New Caledonia is above all a paradise for sharks. But not just any sharks: they are used to being considered as fearsome predators, they are essentially opportunistic scavengers.

programme.title: The Cheetah Diaries
programme.desc: This time, the younger cheetah cubs are finally playing outside and Emily already feels that some of them seem more suited than others to become cheetah ambassadors.

programme.title: Wildest latin america
programme.desc: The longest chain of mountains in the world at 7200km, the Andes run the length of western South America and dictate the climate for the whole continent.

programme.title: EPIC SAFARI ENCOUNTERS
programme.desc: Wildlife guide, Craig accompanies Kristina to one of the wildest places in Zimbabwe – Chitake Springs, aka, Ambush Alley. They get up close to a huge bull elephant and Kristina has her first- ever sighting of endangered wild dogs.

programme.title: Wild Portugal
programme.desc: Although Portugal is a country with a relatively small territory, the difference in landscapes is quite notorious.

programme.title: Wildest Europe
programme.desc: The Mediterranean region is one of the most infamous on the planet. At the southernmost latitudes of Europe it experiences high temperatures and low rainfall to make it one of the driest on the continent.

programme.title: The Cheetah Diaries
programme.desc: Episode 3

programme.title: Jungle Planet
programme.desc: In the State of California, some of the world's most notable forests in terms of their size, diversity, and gigantic trees grow. Redwoods thrive over the different mountain ranges, breaking all records of height.

programme.title: Australia: Land Beyond Time
programme.desc: Stunning inside look at a land more like another planet than another country. Includes a rare natural event that happens only once every hundred years: the formation of a giant inland ocean out of nowhere in the middle of the harshest desert outback.

programme.title: Hurricanes: Rise Of The Superstorms
programme.desc: Hurricanes are the strongest storms on earth. They can inflict losses of billions of dollars and thousands of lives. Beyond the hype that surrounds these dangerous events, are stories of significance to society, nature and the future.

programme.title: Wildest Islands: The Caribbean - The Wild Side of Paradise
programme.desc: Between the continents of North and South America is a tropical paradise: the Caribbean. This archipelago of over 7,000 islands and reefs lies within the crystal clear waters of the Caribbean Sea.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will be chained to either side of a platform with the contestant having one key to free them from chains. Player dunks their head into a tank and retrieves a cows heart with their mouth.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: In this couples stunt, partners will hang by their ankles, they will each hold onto one end of a rope and be lifted over the water. Couples will use their mouths to root around in pies made from wax worms, pigs stomach, fish sauce and duck tongue.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Player A is placed on a dunk tank. In the tank is a mixture of cow parts floating in water. One member of the team will be suspended by their ankles underneath a helicopter.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: In this stunt, the female contestant will be placed in a cage that is hung from a helicopter and is approx. 20 feet in the air. A dumpster filled with disgusting garbage is placed at one end of an alley.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will be standing on a beam that is suspended high in the air. Player is placed in a coffin with 100 chicken feet and is then covered in rats. Couples stunt one of the team members is hog tied by four ropes and suspended.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Two contestants are seated in the front of a car. The driver is blind folded and the passenger must navigate for them. Player is strapped down in a coffin and then covered with 500 Tarantulas.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will exit a helicopter and release a flag. They will be standing on platforms suspended in the air. Contestant must chew through the cow intestine. Contestants will ride a mini motorcycle across a beam that is suspended from a crane.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant must get on a pole directly out, under the nose of a helicopter. Players will bob in cheese and then eat grasshoppers. Contestants are hung upside down into a Plexiglas tank filled with Eels. Contestants must drive up with only two wheels.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: The contestant will be put in a clear plex-glass tube that will be lifted up and placed just above the water. Snakes and lizards will be dumped in the box. Contestant will be standing on a plexi-glass incline pirtched on top of a roof in the air.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will be standing in either end of two large cylinders, suspended in the air over water. Player must grab a mouth full of insects, then place into a meat grinder using their mouth. Inside the tanker truck, it would be filled with water.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants are placed in a box with two plexi-glass walls that will be lifted off the ground. Contestants will be served live snails. Contestants are seated in a car that is in the back of a semi truck.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants will be dangling from a rope off the roof. Contestants will have to clear a bug splattered car windshield using only their mouth and face. The contestant will be standing on a beam suspended from a crane.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will stand on top of a truck as it speeds trying to grab as many flags. Contestants will shoot potatoes at a target using a shoulder mounted air cannon. The contestant must start the car, there are tractors driving towards their car.

programme.title: Lo que comemos las mujeres

programme.title: Lo que comemos las mujeres

programme.title: Lo que comemos las mujeres

programme.title: Lo que comemos las mujeres

programme.title: Pescado desconocido
programme.desc: Nuestro chef, Kumar Paredes, inicia la búsqueda del primer pez desconocido en su barrio: el callao. Luego de visitar un mercado en el puerto de Lima, pesca un pez llamado picuda. ¿Pasará este pescado la prueba de frío, calor y fritura?

programme.title: Pescado desconocido
programme.desc: Continúa la búsqueda de peces desconocidos y esta vez llegamos al tradicional barrio de Magdalena. Tras ver la oferta marítima del día, el chef Kumar Paredes decide probar el pez espada.

programme.title: Pescado desconocido
programme.desc: Surquillo es reconocido por tener uno de los mercados más variados de Lima. El chef Kumar Paredes llega a este barrio en busca del pez desconocido del día: cachema.

programme.title: Pescado desconocido
programme.desc: Kumar visita Lince para probar un pescado que mucha gente conoce, pero pocos lo usan. Estamos hablando del bonito. ¿Te atreves a ver que preparan?

programme.title: Pescado desconocido
programme.desc: Kumar fue a Santiago de Surco y había un pez que logró llamar su atención llamado chiri. Lo probará en tres platos diferentes para ver cómo queda. ¡Veamos el resultado!

programme.title: Pescado desconocido
programme.desc: Breña es un distrito reconocido en Lima y nuestro carismático chef Kumar Paredes acudió a uno de los mercados de este distrito en busca de peje blanco. Seamos testigos de esta aventura.

programme.title: Pescado desconocido
programme.desc: Finaliza la primera temporada y volveremos a ver a Kumar en Santiago de Surco. Preparará un pescado en tres platos distintivos llamado fortuno. ¿Funcionará?

programme.title: Pescado desconocido
programme.desc: Kumar está interesado en saber cuál es el sabor de la doncella, así que fuimos a Lince a buscar este pescado y verá que da como resultado tres platos que preparará. ¡Seamos parte de lo que viene a continuación, vamos!

programme.title: Pescado desconocido
programme.desc: Kumar llegó a este barrio en busca del pez pluma para ponerlo a prueba en los platos que va a preparar.

programme.title: Pescado desconocido
programme.desc: Pueblo libre y su mercado de Bolívar fueron los lugares elegidos por Kumar para conocer La Mocosa. Veamos la creatividad de nuestro chef en los platos que preparó en este episodio.

programme.title: Pescado desconocido
programme.desc: San Juan de Lurigancho es un distrito demasiado grande, por lo que Kumar no fue la excepción para ir a un mercado de ese distrito y buscar un pescado que le gustaba llamado ojón. ¿Con qué platos nos sorprenderá?

programme.title: Pescado desconocido
programme.desc: Kumar conoció a la reineta y decidió ponerlo en práctica. ¿Dará lugar a los platos que preparará nuestro carismático chef? Únete a él y sé parte de esta aventura.

programme.title: Pescado desconocido
programme.desc: Kumar conoció a La Reineta y decidió ponerlo en práctica. ¿Dará lugar a los platos que preparará nuestro carismático chef? Únete a él y sé parte de esta aventura.

programme.title: Pescado desconocido
programme.desc: Fuimos a Jesús María en busca del nuevo pescado desconocido, y Kumar encontró "la pintadilla" para ponerlo a prueba en tres platos diferentes que sorprenderán a más de uno. ¡Vamos!

programme.title: Pescado desconocido
programme.desc: Y esta temporada termina en Cercado de Lima, distrito donde está el Mercado Venezuela, y Kumar conoció al suco o coco, pero como siempre, nuestro chef es tan creativo que le pondrá una prueba a este pescado para ver qué tal resulta.

programme.title: Pescado desconocido
programme.desc: Kumar vuelve en esta tercera temporada con el pescado rinchin y prepara un delicioso ceviche con mango, puré de coliflor y unas pepitas de pescado.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1962, the small town residents of Hanford, California lost their sense of peace when one of their own, 15-year-old Marlene Miller, was murdered.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The 1996 investigation into 48-year-old Martha Hansen's murder is helped by a legal requirement that bars have video cameras installed on the premises.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: At the scene of a vicious murder, the killer went to a great deal of effort to wipe away his fingerprints and obscure his shoe impressions left when he tracked blood trails on the floor.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In a 1992 murder case, the autopsy of a cremated body turns up telltale clues of foul play.

programme.title: Forensic Files: Past Lives
programme.desc: The body of a wealthy American businessman was found in his rental car. Teeth and bone fragments were the only remains. When the victim's wife files an insurance claim for $7 million, investigators seek the help of a renowned forensic anthropologist.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1981, New York correctional officer Donna Payant disappeared and was later found in a landfill. The medical examiner not only identified the cause of death, but also found an important clue.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Three seemingly unrelated deaths prove to be serial murders. The killer had been careful; he used poison which had no taste or odor. Fortunately for investigators, it also had a unique chemical signature.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1995, Palm Beach waitress Denise O'Neill is abducted and murdered. Her neighbor Luis Caballero arouses suspicions by behaving oddly toward TV crews covering the crime.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Professional photographer Charles Rathbun claims model Linda Sobek died during a consensual sexual encounter gone wrong, but Sobek's corpse and digital imaging tell a more sinister story.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A Modesto, California teenager goes missing. With no signs of struggle in her home, police suspect she has simply run away — until her naked, bruised body is discovered in a ditch 20 miles away.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After a street fight takes the life of a national wrestling champion, police must determine if he was killed in cold blood or in self-defense.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: One morning in a deserted area outside of Phoenix, a motorcyclist discovers the body of a young woman. She had been beaten, bound, strangled and possibly raped. Nearby plants tell investigators more about the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman convicted of killing her mother in a car fire is granted a new trial. An expert witness has a different opinion as to how the fire started and, if proven, would clear the woman of any culpability.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man riding a bicycle was fatally injured in what police believed to be a hit-and-run accident. Tiny clues found at the scene created a picture of the vehicle which struck him and led police to its driver.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1984, California firefighters battled ten arson fires in three weeks. When cigarettes and a scrap of paper connected the case to similar fires further north, the hunt was on for a dangerous pyromaniac.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2006, Nevada politician Kathy Augustine died mysteriously during a re-election campaign. The medical examiner could neither isolate the cause of death, nor explain the tiny puncture wounds discovered during the autopsy.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: On October 15, 1985, two bomb explosions rocked Salt Lake City and resulted in two deaths. A third explosion occurred the next day; this time, the victim survived.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Several suspects and conflicting evidence complicated a brutal murder investigation. But the forensics were clear on one thing: the killer knew his victim, and that alone gave investigators a head start.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When two women went missing and were later found brutally murdered, police wondered if they were victims of a hate crime.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The murder of an eccentric millionaire was not entirely unexpected; he flaunted his wealth and cared little for personal security. The evidence at the crime seemed to indicate robbery, but investigators wondered if there was something more.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Firefighters find an entire family dead inside their home in an apparent murder-suicide, but there are several inconsistent clues in the rubble. Could ballistics, a time card and some secret audiotapes unravel the mystery?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1994, Rhoda Nathan was found murdered in a Cincinnati hotel room. When hotel employee Elwood Jones visited the emergency room with an infected hand, which he said was cut on a dumpster, the doctor recognized the injury as something else.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In the search for the killer of two Texas teenagers, a behavioral profile led to suspect Jason Massey. Hard science proved the profile was correct, and Massey was executed by lethal injection on April 3, 2001.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2000, Christina Sanoubane was murdered in her Cedar Rapids apartment after moving away from her abusive boyfriend. There are clues at the scene: bloody footprints and DNA from the victim's rape kit.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When police discovered the body of Douglas Beamish's estranged wife, authorities linked 20 cat hairs found on her jacket to a cat owned by Beamish's parents. It was the first time animal DNA was used to solve a criminal case.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: It was one of the most unusual cases in forensic history. Investigators had to find a way to solve a murder case using only a squashed tomato found at the crime scene and tiny, pinpoint reflections of light in a photograph.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When two boys are brutally attacked, investigators rely on evidence fished out of a nearby pond. It became the first case where diatom analysis was used to place a suspect at the scene of the crime.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Frank DeFazio loses some of his Christmas spirit when he has to cancel his yearly gathering for the homeless and poor. The girls and friends step in to help him keep the holiday meaningful for the less fortunate.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Shirley and her brother think she's adopted as she doesn't resemble any Feeneys. Later at the hospital where Shirley was born the girls try to get the truth by accessing a private file room in disguise. Is Shirley not a true Feeney female?

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mindy is the beautiful bride and Mork is the outrageously funny groom - who may not be able to fit into his tuxedo if he can't convince Orson to approve the marriage and undo his transformation of Mork into an English sheep dog.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mork and unsuspecting Mindy hatch a comedy plot that's bigger than both of them when an egg emerges from Mork's navel that grows and grows until it bursts open and out pops their full-grown, middle-aged-looking son.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mindy is dazed at the reality that she and Mork are the parents of Mearth -half-earthling/half-orkan with the body of a 50-year-old and the mind of an infant and feels lef t out when Mearth accepts Mork as his mommy.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mork buys Mearth a fortune in presents to assure his happiness, and when Mindy, fearing a spoiled child, orders that they be returned, their unusual child decides they don't love him anymore.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mearth hates his first day of school on planet Ork so much that Mork and Mindy accompany him back to Ork Prep, where Mork's ancient teacher - who looks like a child - is still sternly in charge.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mindy, already worried about losing her job at the television station, foresees disaster when Mork and Mearth accidentally transfer minds, forcing her to take Mearth in Mork’s body to meet the new boss.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Richie, Ralph, and Potsie endure the harassment of "hell week" to prove themselves worthy to enter their college fraternity, Phi Kappa Nu.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Sophomore Joanie Cunningham gets basic back-seat defense tips from Richie and Fonzie before her first "car date" with a senior boy, and then cramps her older brother's style when she and her date show up at his college "make-out" party.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: What begins as a humorous escapade with a motorcycle turns into a tragic vigil for the Cunninghams and their friends.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Fonzie's latest romantic interest, a ballet teacher, is secretly yearning to turn professional and dance with the greats in New York. Fonzie, however, has trouble accepting that she may forgo their relationship to pursue her dreams of fame.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: When Ralph Malph is hypnotized to cure his fright after a tornado warning is posted, Ralph's loss of fear causes him to tempt fate by suggesting that the Fonz needs training wheels for his stupid motorcycle

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Joanie believes she has to smoke to fit in with the cool girls. She ignores the pleas from her family to stop, until the Fonz defines what cool really means

programme.title: Happy Days

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: When Richie is caught two-timing Lori Beth for a pretty baton twirler, the Fonz has to step in and give Richie a few lessons in love.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Laverne shows Lenny a kindness and then gives him a kiss. Lenny now feels he loves her, and she's now his. No one can get through to him that this isn't the case, but Laverne hopes to let him down easy without completely breaking his heart.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: A small fire in the girls' bedroom becomes the start of a rift between them. Both girls become smitten with one of the handsome firemen that show up. Who will warm his heart and whose hopes will be extinguished?

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: All are baffled by a woman's interest in Squiggy as a boyfriend. He loves her like crazy. She's able to make her every whim his command. Can Squiggy be woken up to see she's only using him?

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: The girls contact a building inspector to help Edna fix all the problems in their building...but Edna's later mad at them. She's got a short time to get up to code or face a huge fine. Will Edna abandon the girls and tenants in her anger?

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Shirley starts seeing an older rich gentleman. His snobby family thinks that she only wants his money and couldn't possibly like him for any other reason. Will they let her prove she's not a 'gold digger' or simply stand on their assumptions?

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: A new male employee at Shotz arouses Laverne's suspicion as she catches him committing corporate espionage. No one, even Shirley, believes her story. Can she get her friend back on her side and foil the plans of "the man in green?

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley

programme.desc: The famished Laverne and Shirley seek outside sources of sustenance when they become counselors at a fat farm and face slim pickings.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día nueve
programme.desc: Los concursantes prueban el plato estrella del chef Ramsay y se les dan veinte minutos para reproducirlo. Las tensiones aumentan entre los chefs en medio de acusaciones de trampa.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día diez - Parte 1
programme.desc: Luego de una visita sorpresa de familiares, los concursantes restantes deberán diseñar sus propios restaurantes y jerarquías para el servicio final.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día diez - Parte 2
programme.desc: Desde el menú hasta la decoración, los dos finalistas deben demostrar su talento al chef Ramsay, ya que cada uno está a cargo de sus propios restaurantes.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El tiránico Chef Gordon Ramsay regresa por tercer verano para enseñar y torturar a posibles Chefs. El ganador recibirá un trabajo de Chef en el resort Green Valley Ranch de Nevada.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los dos equipos se enfrentan en un desafío de preparación de alimentos que recompensa a los ganadores por la oportunidad de pasar tiempo con el Chef Ramsay fuera de la cocina.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Ramsay ordena a los concursantes restantes que preparen el desayuno para los miembros del servicio visitantes. El equipo ganador tendrá tiempo libre y los perdedores tendrán el rol de patrullar la cocina.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: En el cuarto día, los Chefs restantes compiten en una prueba de degustación con los ojos vendados. Los perdedores deben aceptar un castigo difícil mientras los ganadores cenan con el Chef Ramsay.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Para avanzar en este desafío, los siete Chefs restantes deben comprar y preparar la comida para la recepción de una boda.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Melissa se une a los hombres en una competencia para ver qué equipo puede preparar los mejores platos de langosta. Pero hay un problema: los equipos deben matar primero a sus crustáceos.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los seis concursantes restantes deben preparar aperitivos y platos principales con las sobras, por lo que ambos equipos deben crear sus propios menús de cena.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Ramsay consolida a los cinco concursantes restantes en un equipo, pero primero deben competir entre sí para impresionar a 100 estudiantes de secundaria.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los tres Chefs restantes preparan versiones gourmet de platos estadounidenses clásicos para jueces externos: sus madres, que no saben qué platos están probando.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los dos últimos competidores se enfrentan a un desafío final que implica algo más que cocinar: deben diseñar y administrar sus propios restaurantes.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: En el final de temporada, los ánimos se enfurecen cuando los dos concursantes preparan un último servicio de cena para el chef Ramsay.

programme.desc: En septiembre de 1997, un equipo de hombres cubiertos con máscaras asaltó una instalación de autos blindados en Los Ángeles, y escaparon con 18,9 millones de dólares, el mayor golpe en la historia de robos de los Estados Unidos.

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI
programme.desc: En julio de 1996, dos hombres entraron en una casa de empeño en Birmingham, Alabama, y asesinaron sin piedad a los empleados. Para desconocimiento de los asesinos, una cámara secreta de vigilancia grabó el tiroteo.

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI
programme.desc: En el condado Lincoln, Nebraska, un traficante de drogas fugitivo se involucró en un tiroteo con policías, hiriendo a dos de ellos, y evitó la captura después de una persecución a alta velocidad.

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI
programme.desc: Después de que un criminal con trayectoria cometiera un homicidio vehicular en Nueva Orleans, los agentes del FBI lo rastrearon por medio de sus hábitos y adicciones.

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI
programme.desc: A principios de los años ochenta, un par de ladrones en serie de bancos ganaron reputación entre las fuerzas de la ley como bandidos formidables.

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI
programme.desc: En el verano de 1999, Texas fue aterrorizada por un asesino en serie que viajaba en tren. El FBI organizó una fuerza de tareas para reunir información sobre el viajero peligroso y crear un perfil que ayudara a localizarlo.

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI
programme.desc: En octubre de 1987, un oficial de policía de Boston que respondió a una llamada por un altercado doméstico fue herido de muerte. Las autoridades hicieron una persecución a lo largo de la ciudad, pero solo pudieron encontrar las huellas del sospechoso.

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI
programme.desc: En agosto de 1984, el hijo de un constructor exitoso de bienes raíces fue secuestrado en frente del negocio de su padre en Miami. Después de que el padre recibió la exigencia de un rescate de tres millones de dólares, el FBI se involucró.

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI
programme.desc: En octubre de 1995, una familia de Carolina del Sur fue tomada de rehén como parte de un robo de banco bien planificado. La policía local rápidamente identificó a dos de los criminales, pero el autor demostró ser más evasivo.

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI
programme.desc: En febrero de 1988, un vendedor de una disquera en Sandusky, Ohio, recibió un disparo mortal en su camioneta. Después de descubrir un bolso con miles de dólares dentro del vehículo, la policía supo que el robo no era el motivo.

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI
programme.desc: En junio de 1973, una niña fue secuestrada de un parque estatal en el río Misuri mientras acampaba con su familia. Pasaron varios meses sin tener pistas, pero luego un agente del FBI tomó un interés particular en el caso.

programme.title: Los archivos del FBI
programme.desc: En 1996, un grupo de políticos extremistas robaron dos veces un banco en Spokane, Washington, con el uso de bombas caseras y la precisión militar para escapar.

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: When the Baroness acquires a legendary conch and uses its mind-controlling siren song on all the males among Joe and Cobra's ranks, it's up to Scarlett, Lady Jaye and Cover Girl to end her reign of terror.

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: Tokyo is the site of a world economic conference - and Cobra's latest target for chaos. When Cobra devises a plan to destroy the whole city with an earthquake, the Joes are sent in to stop them.

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: Part 1 of 2. When G.I. Joe captures a secret Cobra explosive, Cobra responds by kidnapping several Joe family members and brainwashing them into fighting a battle for its return. It's a strike force the Joes are afraid to fight or harm.

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: Part 2 of 2. The Joes are caught off-balance when their very families and personal lives are used against them. To defeat Cobra, retrieve the explosive, and rescue their loved ones, the Joes not only have to be tough, but creative too.

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: While on a camping trip, Bazooka watches a monstrous creature rise from the water and devour what looks like a giant firefly. Unfortunately, none of the Joes believe him, until it's revealed that this "sea serpent" is a Cobra-built submarine!

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: After an air duel, Storm Shadow crashes into a lake in the north of Britain. He's rescued from his sinking plane by an apparition who guides him to the legendary sword Excalibur resting on the lake bottom. With the sword, Storm Shadow will be unstoppable!

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: Cobra kidnaps people with paranormal powers for a battalion of "Special Recruits," hoping to use their incredible gifts against the Joes.

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: Cobra attacks the U.S. treasury's printing plant, but its not money they're after. Cobra commander wants fort Knox's top-secret blueprints in order to stage the most incredible robbery of all time! That is, unless the Joes can stop this gold rush.

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: Cobra mounts an attack on the oil fields of a Middle Eastern kingdom. When the Joe team responds, their skystrikers are torn apart in midair by Cobra's sonic scrambler, a soundwave device powerful enough to shatter weapons and vehicles into pieces.

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: Cobra uses a dude ranch as a base of operations to seize a government solar energy project. Once they have it under their control, Cobra commander plans to harness the power of the sun itself to wreak destruction on the western United States!

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: Flint, Lady Jaye, Cobra commander and the Baroness are kidnapped by a demented and powerful genius. On his private island, they battle deadly life-sized toys in a game with only one possible winner...until they do the unthinkable: team up!

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: When Quick kick gives a martial arts demonstration on a college campus, Amber, a student, wants to join the Joe team. When she tries to prove her worth by taking on Cobra by herself, the Joes have to teach her - and Cobra - what teamwork is all about.

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: Cobra steals a dangerous bacterium that proves resistant to antibiotics. But when it's accidentally exposed to air and grows to monstrous proportions, Airtight and the rest of the Joes must battle this giant germ before it causes massive destruction.

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: A mysterious series of telephone tips about “The Viper” sends the Joes across the globe, raiding one Cobra operation after another to prevent attack. But when they learn Cobra is not responsible for the messages, they have to find out exactly who is.

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: Part 1 of 2. Using Zartan's synthoid technology, Cobra commander replaces key politicians and military leaders in an effort to cut off the Joes' funding.

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: Part 2 of 2. Cobra's s plot proves to be working… until Destro discovers a duplicate of himself constructed by Cobra commander. The angered Destro takes information on the synthoids to the only people on Earth who can stop Cobra: G.I. Joe.

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: Cobra commander hires a gypsy to summon the spirits of three great warriors from the past. Once in control of the ghosts, he commands them to destroy G.I. Joe. But the Baroness, now relieved of her duties, tells the Joes how to eliminate the threat.

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero
programme.desc: The Joes go Hollywood as technical advisers on a movie about their special-missions unit. But when the filmmakers attempt to use a captured Cobra stinger, Cobra Commander has another idea for the movie's ending.

programme.title: GI Joe: A Real American Hero

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: After the defeat of the ghosts and the destruction of the Cursed Realm, the ninja finds themselves famous all over Ninjago.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: With Destiny’s Bounty impounded, the police hire Ronin to track down the fugitive ninja. Misako has been arrested and is confronted by Nadakhan, who reveals he has trapped Wu in the Teapot of Tyrahn.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: With the ninja imprisoned, Nadakhan uses the Realm Crystal to free his old crew. The ninja encounter Captain Soto, the first captain of the Destiny’s Bounty, who tells them the story of how he originally trapped Nadakhan in the Teapot.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: The secret, he says, is the venom of a Tiger Widow, a rare creature that lives on only one island. The venom can slow a djinn down. Soto is the only one who knows where the island is and will only tell if the ninja breaks him out of jail.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Nadakhan vows revenge on the ninja and NINJAGO. The ninja and Soto escape from jail, only to find out the map to the island is on Nadakhan’s ship. Nadakhan discovers that Nya looks just like Delara, his long-lost love.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: The ninja’s search for Nadakhan’s ship turns up nothing. Nadakhan’s crew is struggling to handle an airship that used to sail only on the oceans. Nadakhan confronts Jay and talks him into making a wish that will win him Nya.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Jay reveals to Cole that he made two wishes with Nadakhan. Large chunks of NINJAGO City are disappearing without a trace. The ninja find the Tiger Widow Island on the map but it is an island that exists on no other chart or database.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Jay is trapped on Nadakhan’s ship, as Nadakhan tries to force him to make his third wish. Lloyd, Cole, and Nya are marooned on Tiger Widow Island.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: The ninja are trying to figure out a way to save Jay from Nadakhan’s ship. Two screenwriters, Kevin and Dan, suggest that they build a fake raid zeppelin and disguise themselves as Sky Pirates.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Jay and Nya have been holed up at the police precinct, but the Sky Pirates track him down. They flee by boat to the lighthouse where Zane’s father was once held captive. Nadakhan learns that the ninja still have the Tiger Widow venom.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Master Wu mistakenly tries to single-handedly complete a battle he began decades ago against Acronix, one of the twin Hands of Time.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: The Ninja learn more about the Krux and Acronix – the two fallen Elemental Masters known as the Hands of Time – and are sure that this threat has finally been eliminated.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: Kai's investigation of a Vermillion Warrior Helmet leads him to discover that Krux is alive and well in Ninjago, living under an assumed identity.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: In the midst of an epidemic of mysterious metal thefts by the Vermillion Warriors, Lloyd realizes that stepping up and taking over for the ailing Master Wu is not an easy task.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: The Ninja reunite with Wu and turn to the aid of a shrunken Pythor in order to figure out how to defeat the unstoppable Anacondrai.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: The Ninja now have all the items they need to get to the tomb of the First Spinjitzu Master but before they can figure out the last riddle that leads to the location of the tomb.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: The Ninja use Ronan’s airship to travel to the tomb of the First Spinjitzu Master in an underwater cave under the ocean, only to find out Moro is already there.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: When Moro uses the Realm Crystal to open a portal to the Cursed Realm, ghosts take over the town - but the Ninja, in disguise, manage to get Lloyd to the center of the town and Lloyd steals the crystal…

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: As the ghosts converge around and mobilize the Preeminent into a hulking giant behemoth, the Ninja use Airjitzu to fight the mobile beast in an attempt to slow it down.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago: Masters of Spinjitzu
programme.desc: The Ninja reunite with Wu and turn to the aid of a shrunken Pythor in order to figure out how to defeat the unstoppable Anacondrai.

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Frustrado por su trabajo, Gaspar busca apoyo en el Abuelo y el Noruego y termina accidentado. Mientras, gracias a la medicina experimental, Peluzín se convierte en el Dr Lambretón.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Pelu el Payaso le pide a Jony que sea su nuevo ayudante e inician una gira espectacular que da muchos frutos. Mientras tanto, el Noruego descubre su afición por los tatuajes.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Peluzín adquiere una nueva mascota que revolucionará el vecindario. En tanto el Noruego y Gaspar intentan ayudar a el Lentejas a superar sus extrañas inclinaciones sexuales.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo y el Noruego buscan nuevos horizontes a través de la creación de una fundación, mientras Peluzín cae en la cuenta de su soledad y sale a buscar amigos.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego aprende inglés y se prepara para vivir el sueño americano. En tanto, el Abuelo llega a un reencuentro con sus ex-compañeros de colegio y descubre una verdad sepultada por el tiempo.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Peluzín tiene éxito con un nuevo método de protesta, mientras El Noruego y Jony dan sus primeros pasos en la "cossa nostra

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: La Familia abre un grupo de WhatsApp para estar más conectados pero este se sale de control, mientras que Peluzín aprrovecha una noticia de un asesinato para sacarle dinero a Pitipú.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El calentamiento global trae consigo una mueva amenaza para la ciudad, mientras que Irma y Peluzín emprenden en un nuevo negocio, reclutando a varios amigos.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego milagrosamente logra que le den un crédito bancario, mientras que Peluzín se aprovecha de una muerte reciente dentro del edificio para su beneficio económico.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego emprende en un nuevo negocio con pulgas, mientras que el Abuelo y Jonathan son tomados como rehenes por unos crimínales en un asalto al banco.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Jonathan y Gaspar buscan darle una lección al Abuelo en en Día del Padre, mientras que el Noruego se siente que no es valorado por Olaf y junto con Peluzín deciden tomar cartas en el asunto.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo se topa un con Genio quien le conceda varios deseos, mientras que el Noruego decide lanzarle una fiesta sorpresa de cumpleaños a Olaf para que recupere su infancia perdida.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: La compañía donde trabaja Gaspar atraviesa un recorte de personal pero el es de los pocos afortunados que se salva y es mandado a una capacitación a Estados Unidos, mientras que Peluzín toma el papel de Gaspar en México.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar atraviesa una crisis en su periodo de entrenamiento en Estados Unidos, mientras que el resto de la familia decide alcanzar a Gaspar

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego se enamora de la estatua de cera de Ivanka Trump y toda la familia decide hacer un viaje y atravesar todo el país en auto hasta Nueva York.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego decide ir a NY a conocer a la verdadera Ivanka pero en el camino el grupo se separa de el Abuelo y Peluzín.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego sigue con su plan de casarse con la Ivanka de cera, mientras que el Abuelo y Peluzín afianzan su relación después de su gran viaje

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: La familia va a Washington a pedir la mano de Ivanka con un resultado inesperado, mientras que Johnny busca deshacer la relación enfermiza entre el Abuelo y Peluzín.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego recibe la sorpresa que después de una muchos años de crímenes su papá le deja un jugoso botín como herencia, mientras que Jonathan y Ortega buscan a un adulto que los lleve a la premier de la película del momento.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego se muda a un lujoso departamento y se dedica a buscar a un nuevo roommate, mientras que El Abuelo y Jonathan se pelean por quedarse con el cuarto una vez que el Noruego dejo el departamento.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Jonathan es admitido a una reconocida escuela privada y Gaspar al no poder cubrir los gastos decide aventurarse con Peluzín en unos negocios turbios, mientras el Noruego busca consejos por parte de su familia porque no esta contento.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El abuelo se ahoga con un hueso de pollo y LFDB se ve forzada a buscar ayuda de emergencia, mientras que el Noruego y Peluzín deciden ingresar a un gimnasio y competir por los resultados.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo se involucra sentimentalmente con la nueva roommate del Noruego, la cual esconde un oscuro secreto, mientras tanto Peluzín y Jony buscan lanzar a Olaf al estrellato.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Tenta-Culo celebra su aniversario y hace una gran fiesta donde invita a todos, desafortunadamente durante el evento sucede un crimen y nadie puede salir hasta encontrar al responsable.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar y el Abuelo se topan con una familia muy peculiar, situación que el Abuelo busca aprovechar, mientras que Peluzín y Pitipu buscan curar a Don Sebas de una extraña adicción.

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: Genets, and their relatives the mustelids, like weasels and raccoons, are armed with disproportionate ferocity for such relatively small animals, capable of hunting in almost all terrestrial ecosystems.

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: In the world of hunters, ferocity does not necessarily equate to size; it's often just the reverse and the smaller hunter is the braver and more fearless.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: The blonde manes of golden snub-nose monkeys; pink flamingo feathers brought on by an all-crustacean diet; the markings of gemsboks and cheetahs.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: A gorilla wrestling match, pushy moose antlers, long pelican bills that snap at any enemy within range, and a megashark's stereo sniffer.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Sea lions throw their weight around to win a mate, Cape buffalo deliver knockout punches, Canada geese hit hard with their wings, and lionesses rule the Savanna with an iron paw.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Warthogs' lumpy armor, giant African bullfrogs' jumping and biting skills, wild turkeys' sharp beaks and razorlike spurs, and Nile crocodiles' powerful jaws.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: A glacial stroll alongside a Galápagos tortoise; dancing with venomous European adders; a battle between Lacerta lizards; leopard seals' stealth attacks.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Chatty capuchin monkeys; Eurasian river otters' chilling screams; fruit bats' loud complaints; orcas' human-scale speech systems.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #17: Tactics Of Angels

programme.desc: Lupin's attempt to steal a time machine causes a crazy mishap! Now stuck in ancient Japan, his team and Inspector Zenigata must join forces to get back to their own time. But notorious thief Lupin has enemies everywhere... and everywhen!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #20: Sweet Lost Night
programme.desc: Turns out the Magic Lamp is real, and Lupin's found a way to steal it! But this genie has a price: to grant his wish, she demands half his memories.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #21: The Last Job
programme.desc: Lupin and his companions have their sights on a Japanese cultural treasure, a priceless Buddha statue. But when a mysterious group of ninja thieves get the jump on them, it might just be the gang's last job!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: The Hida Speedway has been completed and Lupin is looking to take top prize at the first race. The race is actually a trap designed by the Scorpion Gang who are intent on killing Lupin and eliminating all criminal competition.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Fujiko has stolen something from a man named Pycal, and he wants it back. Pycal is a magician who is able to shoot flames from his hands, walk on air, and deflect bullets with ease. Lupin goes up against Pycal in hopes of saving Fujiko.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: A boat collision ruins Lupin and Fujiko's quiet boating expedition. They discover a woman named Linda in the other boat just as gunmen on a larger boat attack them.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko successfully pull off a heist; that is until Zenigata manages to shoot Lupin with a tranquilizer dart. Zenigata hauls Lupin off to jail. Despite Fujiko's best efforts, she cannot break Lupin out of prison.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: With the help of some quick gunplay by his partner Jigen, Lupin takes on the world in elaborate heists, classic car chases, and nasty explosions. Fujiko, a buxom redhead with a penchant for betrayal, always gets tangled up in Lupin's capers.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: One rainy afternoon, a man seeks Lupin's help on behalf of a young woman. The woman is actually Fujiko, who is after a diamond known as "The Star of Killamanjaro". The diamond was implanted into the chest of a mob boss.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Three scrolls contain the secret of creating a blade like the Zantetsuken. Lupin wants to steal them as a matter of family pride because his grandfather, Arsene Lupin, stole them back in the 19th century.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Napoleon once owned a deck of fortune-telling cards that are now in the hands of a millionaire known as Mr. Gold. Lupin plans to steal them during Mr. Gold's birthday party, and Zenigata plans to stop him. Lupin succeeds in stealing the mysterious cards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang aim to steal the blueprints for a new computer. In their way is a man skilled with the machinegun and his hit-man partner named Poon, who used to be Fujiko's partner in the past.

programme.title: Great Games

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: 10/01/2020 - Ian Anderson struck out nine over six scoreless innings to help lead the Braves to a shutout victory over the Reds in a series-clinching victory.

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: 9/30/2020 - Behind strong pitching from Jose Urquidy and Cristian Javier, the Astros picked up the 3-1 victory to upset the Twins in the 2020 Wild Card Series.

programme.title: Great Games
programme.desc: 10/27/20: The Dodgers rallied in the 6th inning against the Rays, then Mookie Betts homered to lead Los Angeles to a World Series victory, their first championship in 32 years.

programme.title: Great Games
