programme.title: Rise Of The Superheroes
programme.desc: This is the story of how comic book superheroes were brought to life in cinema, from Tim Burton’s Batman films to The Avengers, Black Panther and beyond, and how they first took over Hollywood and then conquered the world.

programme.title: Dirty Work
programme.desc: A spiteful loser finds his true calling when he opens a highly successful business specializing in revenge.

programme.title: Season of the Witch
programme.desc: A 14th-century Crusader returns to a homeland devastated by the Black Plague. A beleaguered church commands the knight to transport an accused witch to a remote abbey, where monks will perform a ritual in hopes of ending the pestilence.

programme.title: Yellowbeard
programme.desc: A 17th-century pirate in search of treasure. He's accompanied by his son, who has the location of the treasure tattooed on his head. It is a parody on the pirate movies of earlier days.

programme.title: Apocalypto
programme.desc: As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

programme.title: Soul Plane
programme.desc: After a humiliating experience on an airplane, Nashawn sues the airline and is awarded a huge settlement. Determined to make good with the money, Nashawn creates the full service airline of his dreams, complete with sexy stewardesses & funky music.

programme.title: Species: The Awakening
programme.desc: When Miranda Hollander suffers a strange blackout, she learns her true origin as a human-alien hybrid and becomes locked in battle with other hybrids. But time is running out…will she surrender to her own killer instincts in the search for a mate?

programme.title: El extraordinario siglo XX
programme.desc: Después de una regresión mundial, la década de 1930 vio un grupo en ascenso de fascistas que comenzaba a dominar el nuevo mundo y amenazaba con arrastrar al mundo de regreso a la guerra.

programme.title: El extraordinario siglo XX
programme.desc: Una década que comenzó con el estallido de la guerra terminaría también con el mejor intento de paz mundial. A pesar de sus horrores, la iconografía de la década estaría ligada para siempre a ella.

programme.title: El extraordinario siglo XX
programme.desc: Con las culturas solidificándose y los identificadores más tarde reconocidos como elementos básicos de la época, la década de 1950 se hizo conocida como el punto de partida de la cultura pop.

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Un vendedor acude a los expertos del empeño para mostrarles un artículo utilizado en la película "Volver al futuro II". Rick se siente pasado de moda cuando llega a él un extraño calendario de 1900 de una empresa de químicos.

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Rick va a Washington D. C. a ver uno de los primeros Jeep, el cual fue fabricado para la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Aprovechando que está en D. C., visita una librería de tomos antiguos para ver un libro de alquimia.

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Este episodio de "El precio de la historia" levanta vuelo con una edición original de 1911 de la novela "Peter Pan": ¿la adquirirá Rick o preferirá gastarse sus recursos en un pedazo de metal de una aeronave?

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Rick ve una espada con pistola del siglo XVIII. ¿Le dará al blanco del trato o le saldrá el tiro por la culata? Llega a la escena un retrato del legendario actor de cine y teatro John Barrymore.

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Rick negocia el precio de unos anillos de cuando los 49ers de San Francisco ganaron el Super Bowl. ¿Podrá lograr una buena jugada? Corey y Rick ponen a prueba un fusil de pesca: ¿descubrirán aguas turbias en las características de este artículo?

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Para celebrar el episodio número 500 de la serie El precio de la historia, Rick considera invertir capital en la capital de la nación. Para empezar, quiere adquirir un juego de cucharas de plata creadas por el patriota estadounidense Paul Revere.

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: El futuro pinta bien para Gold & Silver con una pintura de Marc Chagall que le llama la atención a Rick. ¿Obtendrá esta obra maestra o acabará con un trato descolorido? Más tarde, Rick intenta comprar un anillo de la Serie Mundial de los Boston Red Sox.

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Un vendedor llega con un biciclo antiguo que pone a Rick a rodar: ¿decidirá que este trato vale la pena o le dará la vuelta? A Chum le toca el lado filoso del trato en el momento en que le vende una katana japonesa a Dana White, el presidente de la UFC.

programme.title: El extraordinario siglo XX
programme.desc: Después de la Primera Guerra Mundial, los países comenzaron a reinventar y solidificar nuevas identidades culturales, que van desde la forma en que los ciudadanos se vestían, la forma en que compraban y los lugares a los que viajaban.

programme.title: Ataque Animal
programme.desc: Un conservacionista desarmado escapa por poco de las fauces de un león agresivo. Un piloto dormido atrae a una hiena hambrienta y una leona renegada cambia las tornas después de que una cacería de dos días sale mal.

programme.title: Ataque Animal
programme.desc: ¿Qué puede pasar cuando te encuentras con un oso en la naturaleza? Dos excursionistas de Montana son atacados por una osa. Un joven pierde a su madre por un oso negro hambriento de 400 libras; y dos cazadores en Alaska son emboscados por un oso pardo.

programme.title: Ataque Animal
programme.desc: ¿Qué peligro acecha debajo de la superficie del agua?

programme.title: Descubriendo el mundo
programme.desc: Este es un retrato real de Mayotte, una isla donde los pequeños pueblos viven en paz con costumbres ancestrales y donde abunda la creatividad de la naturaleza.

programme.title: Descubriendo el mundo
programme.desc: Históricamente, Mallorca ha capturado la fantasía de los artistas de todo el mundo a lo largo de los años, ya que Miró, Picasso, Dalí, Chopin y Sand cayeron bajo el hechizo de la irresistible Mallorca.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Tour de un cocinero
programme.desc: En New Orleans, Louisiana, Tony atrapa un caimán Bayou, se refresca con helado mundialmente famoso, tiene problemas con la ley, come jambalaya con un chef bailarín y se relaja con un poco de jazz local.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Tour de un cocinero
programme.desc: Conocida como la capital de la felicidad de Brasil, Salvador da Bahía ofrece una variedad de mercados. Aquí, Tony participa en una ceremonia tradicional local y experimenta los talentos culinarios del famoso artista de la cocina bahiana: el chef Dada.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Tour de un cocinero
programme.desc: ¿Qué es un carioca? Los nativos son adorables bribones que encuentran formas de evitar el trabajo, prefiriendo la playa, coqueteando, frecuentando restaurantes y bares. Tony, bajo la tutela de un carioca ejemplar, prueba el estilo de vida.

programme.title: Iconos de vida silvestre
programme.desc: Africa's Big Cats es una mirada cercana a la vida de tres familias de los depredadores felinos más efectivos e icónicos de África que viven en el famoso Parque Kruger: una leona, un leopardo y dos guepardos.

programme.title: Iconos de vida silvestre
programme.desc: Dos de los carnívoros más poderosos de África impactan uno con otro en la sabana. Leones y hienas deben matar casi todos los días para mantener a grandes familias.

programme.title: Ataque Animal

programme.title: Naruto

programme.desc: La familia participa en un concurso de lectura en la biblioteca, pero Lola no quiere unirse. Lincoln sospecha que sus padres le ocultan algo sobre sus orígenes cuando descubre que su álbum de bebé tiene la primera página totalmente en blanco.

programme.title: Una casa de locos
programme.desc: Los niños le dan un viejo muñeco que canta a Lily para detener su llanto, pero rápidamente los vuelve locos; los chicos intentan convencer a Papá de la nueva tecnología cuando le declara la guerra a los dispositivos electrónicos.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln quiere el sofá para ver su programa favorito, pero sus hermanas no le dejan; Lincoln le deja un mensaje a Lori en su correo de voz, pero se arrepiente enseguida y busca la manera de eliminarlo antes de que Lori lo escuche.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln está cansado de que sus hermanas se entrometan en su vida, pero su opinión cambia cuando se burlan de él en la escuela; Lincoln graba los momentos más embarazosos de sus hermanas.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Finalmente cansado de hacer favores para que Lori pasee, Lincoln decide ayudar a Leni pasar su prueba de conducción; Lincoln y nueve de sus hermanas trabajan en equipo para frustrar la tiranía que enfrentan con Lori como su niñera.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln tiene el plan de sentarse en el mejor asiento del carro para el largo viaje. Él debe probar que está lo suficientemente maduro como para sentarse en la mesa con los adultos.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln debe apurar a sus hermanas para no llegar tarde a la escuela; Lincoln consigue la aprobación decisiva para las vacaciones familiares.

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: Lincoln hace todo lo posible por no oír a sus hermanas; Lynn se pelea con Lucy y Lincoln deja que Lynn pase la noche en su cuarto.

programme.title: Una casa de locos
programme.desc: Lincoln quiere capturar la fotografía perfecta de su familia como obsequio para sus padres por motivo de su aniversario de bodas; Lincoln hace una apuesta con sus hermanas.

programme.title: Una casa de locos
programme.desc: La nueva piscina de Lincoln resulta demasiado pequeña y él y sus diez hermanas no pueden usarla al mismo tiempo; Lincoln trata de manipular a Lily para que crezca desarrollando la mentalidad que a él le agrada, no como sus otras hermanas.

programme.title: Una casa de locos
programme.desc: Lincoln invita a Clyde a una fiesta de pijamas, pero se pone celoso cuando Clyde quiere pasar tiempo con sus hermanas; Lincoln escucha a escondidas a sus padres y piensa que han decidido deshacerse de sus hijos.

programme.title: Una casa de locos
programme.desc: Lori le regala a Lincoln una bicicleta rosa de segunda mano, pero como siente vergüenza de que lo ven llevándola, le quita a Lori sin decirle a nada su bicicleta BMX; Lincoln investiga por qué el inodoro está atascado.

programme.title: Una casa de locos
programme.desc: Lincoln derrama uno de los experimentos de Lisa, desencadenando una reacción en cadena en toda la casa; Lincoln trata de animar a la familia a dejar de usar tanta electricidad.

programme.title: Una casa de locos
programme.desc: Lincoln tiene que cuidar la tarántula de la clase; Lincoln decide ir a la huelga hasta que alguien cambie deberes con él.

programme.title: Una casa de locos
programme.desc: Lincoln va a su primer concierto de rock junto a Luna, quien está decidida a hacerle pasar un momento inolvidable; cuando Lincoln encuentrra un sobre en el ático cree que se trata de un fajo de billetes oculto por alguien de la casa.

programme.title: Una casa de locos
programme.desc: Lincoln entrena a Lana para que sustituya a Lola en un concurso, ya que Lola está enferma; Lincoln y Clyde creen que será sencillo hacer de niñeros de Lilly, pero no lo es.

programme.title: Una casa de locos
programme.desc: Lincoln tiene las manos ocupadas cuando sus diez hermanas le piden cubrirlas en el mismo día; Bobby y Lori van en una cita doble con Lincoln y la pequeña hermana de Bobby, Ronnie Anne.

programme.title: Una casa de locos
programme.desc: Lincoln comienza a pasar mucho tiempo en casa de Clyde, porque el padre de éste le presta más atención que su propio padre; Lincoln se monta en una limosina, y después de haber probado el sabor de la buena vida, su actitud cambia.

programme.title: Una casa de locos
programme.desc: La familia de Lincoln forma una banda cuando él se inscribe para un concurso de talentos; la madre de Lincoln le ofrece llevarlo a la oficina dental en la que ella trabaja, mientras que sus hermanas van a trabajar con su padre.

programme.title: Una casa de locos
programme.desc: El Día de los Inocentes, Luan gasta bromas a toda la casa, pero Lincoln este año tiene un plan para evitar caer en ellas; los hermanos Loud van juntos al supermercado a hacer la compra para su mamá, pero Lincoln tiene un plan alternativo.

programme.desc: Tony explores Naples on a quest to define true Italian food and culture.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Iris threw her husband, Wayne, out of the house during a fight, but she never expected he would find a new love so soon. She will confront her husband's new lover, Janie, a woman born with no hands and no feet.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: First, Denise caught her boyfriend having sex with her mom! Next, Luana suspects that her friend is sleeping with her boyfriend, Leroy. Then, Josh is not too happy when he finds out how his girlfriend affords all the football equipment for her son!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Tim doesn't know if he wants to be with Desiree, his wife, and mother of his daughter, or Victoria his gorgeous coworker and Mistress. Then, Olivia is here because she's sick and tired of her husband Fred's cheating ways.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Dave says his girlfriend's constant nagging has driven him into the arms of a 72-year-old woman! Next Joe is about to tell his beautiful girlfriend that he had a one-night stand with a shocking person!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Spirited Betty is in love with Greg, a married man, and is here to break up his home and steal him from his wife, Kirsten. Then Christina says her boyfriend, Sean, does everything she wants except he won't stop sleeping with Megan!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: John weighs almost 700 pounds and couldn't be happier. HIs girlfriend Kim goes so far as to make him choose between her and a 10-foot long sandwich! He chooses the sandwich.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Solo has a few things he needs to tell his best friend and girlfriend, Vixen. Next Cheryl caught her boyfriend, Nick, in bed with another woman. Later Lonnie's wife, Kim, is having an affair with their 18-year-old friend.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Guests feel they have been keeping secrets way too long on today's Jerry Springer Show. Taurus comes clean about cheating on his fiancée Raeleen with her best friend and a man.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Erin's tired of playing house and is ready to tell Eric she's been cheating, and she's moving on! Then Bill's been cheating on his girlfriend for some time and is ready to move on. But wait until she hears he's been sleeping with her step-sister!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Angelo is here to tell his girlfriend that he's a woman. Next, Mikey brought his girlfriend here to tell her that he's been cheating on her. But she has a surprise of her own. Later Jennifer feels she must tell her lover the truth about her sexuality

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Fritz will do anything to help his cousin out - even sleep with his fiancee! Bradley's mom and wife confront him over his affair with his mom's doppelganger!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show: Who’s Hurting My Granddaughter?
programme.desc: Maria claims that her son’s ex Amy and her new boyfriend Brian are abusing and neglecting her granddaughter. But Amy says Maria is a racist and angry over raising her grandchild in a Hispanic home!

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show: I’m Not the Man You Think I Am
programme.desc: Sean says his wife has made him so angry that he’s put her in the hospital over 10 times. Sean’s also got a secret of his own—he is really a she! Can Steve help Sean iron out his issues?

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Sabrionna has been waiting to return for a DNA and lie detector test to prove that Anthony's the father and she has been faithful to him! Then, Patrick returns to prove that he's not the father of Angel's baby while her man Dale fumes!

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Waldo se niega a ser el padre del bebé de Chelsea por su piel clara. Después, Kianna encontró fotos de mujeres desnudas en el teléfono de Nick y condones y colonia en su bolso de gimnasio. ¿Qué dirán los resultados del detector de mentiras de Maury?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: ¿Es Cortney el padre de los hijos de Brittany? Según su hermana, Brittany fue infiel con su prometido Clifton. Después, Melissa afirma que su ex-marido no es el padre de sus gemelos y que es Sean! ¿Lo confirmarán los resultados del ADN?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Shenik y Shenequa aparecieron en el programa de Maury el año pasado después de una prueba de ADN. ¿Pero ahora Shenik se acuesta con el novio de su hermana? Además, lo único que se interpone son los resultados de la prueba del detector de mentiras.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Danica, una nueva mamá, recibió 5 correos electrónicos diferentes de 5 mujeres asegurando que se acostaron con su novio, Jimmy, en su casa. Entonces, ¿el novio de Renee preferirá su adicción a su familia?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Dashawn y su mamá afirman que lo de Monica fue una aventura de una sola vez y que él no puede ser el padre de su bebé. Entonces, April quiere averiguar quién es el padre de su bebé. Después, ¿Frederick o Jason es el padre del bebé de Marietta?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Maury está celebrando las fiestas contando cuentos junto a la chimenea. Compartirá las historias de los antiguos invitados que vinieron a hacerse pruebas de paternidad, al detector de mentiras y más. ¡Averigua si estos invitados han sido buenos o malos!

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Después de hacer 5 pruebas de ADN, Rebecca regresa con 2 hombres más para encontrar al padre de su nuevo bebé. Después, Don y su esposa se alegraron al descubrir que su hijo no era el padre del bebé de Jessica, pero ella cree que Don es el padre.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Don y Amy contrataron a Jessica para cuidar a su hijo, Steven. Años más tarde, Jessica dice que Steven es el padre de su hijo. Además, Marisol ha hecho 16 pruebas de ADN para encontrar al padre de su hijo. ¿La prueba número 17 será la definitiva?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Charlotte y Tasheun se acercaron por el padre de sus hijos en común, Brandon, en un álbum fotográfico, pero ¿la prueba de ADN lo confirmará? Luego, ¿probará Tanya que su bebé Craig III es el hijo de Craig Jr.?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: ¿Probará Katrina, de 25 años, que Christopher, de 50 años, es el padre de su bebé y callará a su nueva novia, Suprina? ¿El padre del bebé de Sarah es Johnny o un hombre casado? Además, Robert niega ser padre de los bebés de dos mujeres.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: ¡Brittany cree que Dionte es el padre de su bebé y lo demostrará! Después, Melissa, de 24 años, afirma que Rob, de 47 años, es el padre de su bebé, ¡pero la hija de Rob quiere pruebas!

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Tammy sospecha que su marido Johnnie se acuesta con Renee y que Robert escucha a su hermana y le es infiel a su prometida adolescente Raven. Además, ¿Tom se acostó con la esposa de su mejor amigo?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: ¿El prometido de Tiffany, Deon, dejó embarazada a su mejor amiga lesbiana? Después, William cree que sus 2 de sus 6 hijos con su ex-esposa Nicole no son suyos y puede ser el padre del hijo de otra mujer! ¡Nuestras pruebas de ADN nos revelan la verdad!

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: La familia de Jackie no confía en su novio cuando está con sus hijos, pero ella insiste en seguir con él. ¿Qué horrible verdad revelará la prueba del detector de mentiras de Shaqualla sobre su novio?

programme.title: El show de Steve Wilkos
programme.desc: Katrina cree que el novio de su hermana Kendra es un infiel y que tiene sexo con su mejor amiga, Nay-Nay. Después, John vuelve al escenario con algo sorprendente.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Rosaura le cuenta a su abuela que está intentando recordar que fue lo que hizo con su hija y cuál fue el parque donde estuvo. Guillermo le propone a Jimena que no se casen.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Camelia y Griselda comienzan a llevar a cabo el plan que tienen para volver loca a Rosaura, mientras que Rosaura discute con su abuela por haberle permitido a Luis Mario entrar en su habitación.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Silvano visita a Rosaura en su casa y le exige que se aleje de Patricio para siempre y que juntos traten de ser felices. Rosaura se niega a seguirlo y junto a Claudia le insisten que se marche.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Patricio teme que Rosaura descubra la verdad acerca de Angeliquita, pero Carlos y Sonia tratan de tranquilizarlo. Camelia y Griselda entre tanto se sienten tranquilas.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Luis Mario y Caridad tienen la esperanza que Angeliquita haga un poco feliz a Rosaura, que aún no ha podido recuperar a su hijita, pero Silvano llega para desafiar a Luis Mario.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Panchita riñe a Verdoso por haberle gritado a Eduardo que asesinó a Anselmo y trata de hacerlo callar pero el loro la acusa de haber sido ella quien se lo contó. Caridad se entera de todo.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Mairita corre a buscar a su hermana para contarle que Teobaldito está muy asustado porque su madre está en la casa y él teme que se lo quiera llevar.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Rosaura y Camelia están dentro de la piscina, peleándose. Eduarda le comenta a Luis Mario que sigue enamorada de Patricio y que él debe olvidar a Rosaura y dedicarse a Maribella.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Rosaura ve a Sonia y comienza a gritar, después choca contra un poste Jimena le dice a Iván que en la vida de ellos hay una realidad que es Adriana y Guillermo. Rosaura recupera el conocimiento.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Patricio amenaza a Silvano con una pistola. Rodrigo llega a casa de Karina. Ella le dice que quiere curarse para mejorar y para quererlo. Luis Mario le cuelga el teléfono a Griselda.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Camelia aconseja a Patricio que encierre a Rosaura en un manicomio. Luis Mario y Maribella se besan y Luis Mario la llama Rosaura. Jimena le dice a Guillermo que prepare todo para el matrimonio.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Teobaldito y Mairita hablan de sus familias cuando llega Rosaura con regalos para la niña, que supone es hermana del niño. Después llega Luis Mario, que viene a traerle merienda a los chicos.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Rosaura le cuenta a su abuela que está intentando recordar que fue lo que hizo con su hija y cuál fue el parque donde estuvo. Guillermo le propone a Jimena que no se casen.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Camelia y Griselda comienzan a llevar a cabo el plan que tienen para volver loca a Rosaura, mientras que Rosaura discute con su abuela por haberle permitido a Luis Mario entrar en su habitación.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Boa Hancock makes Luffy mad when she turns Margaret into a statue. The Snake Princess may have bitten off more than she can chew by challenging the captain of the Straw Hats!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Snake Princess pits Luffy's Gum-Gum abilities against the incredible Haki power of her serpentine sisters in a fight to the death. Will Luffy survive long enough to save his statuesque friends?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy kicks his attack mode into Second Gear to save a precious statue, and the snake sisters start to feel the Straw Hat heat. At the battle's climax, Luffy makes an impression on his opponents.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: News of Luffy's run-in with the Celestial Dragons impresses the Snake Princess, so she tells him the story of her tortured past. Will his honorable nature speed Luffy toward a reunion with his crew?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy is mobbed by a hoard of pretty Kuja women eager to touch a real live man. Granny Nyon offers him a safe haven, but what she has to say might sink his plans for a Straw Hat reunion.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Boa Hancock's illness threatens to sabotage Luffy's rescue mission. However, the Snake Princess just can't say "no" to the rubber-man, so a plan to save Ace is quickly hatched.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While Luffy races to save Ace, Nami tries to survive life on Sky Island, and Franky dances up a snowstorm before making the switch from cola to tea!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Chopper narrowly avoids being served for dinner in a land inhabited by giant birds, and Sanji's refined tastes land him a role as a leading lady on the island of girlish hearts.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Nico Robin finds herself trapped on the island of Tequila Wolf: a miserable land where children are forced to work as slaves. Elsewhere, Usopp tries to survive a run-in with a man-eating plant!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro is held against his will by the pink-haired princess of bad vibes, Brook gets mistaken for the king of darkness, and Luffy continues to eat his way toward a reunion with Fire-Fist Ace!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and Boa arrive at Impel Down, but only thirty-three hours remain until Ace's execution. To save him, the Snake Princess must find a way to hide Luffy during her full-body search!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Time is running out on Ace, so Luffy teams up with a scoundrel who's going to pieces trying to escape Impel Down. There's no love lost between the former foes, but they'd better work together if they want to survive.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy must part ways with a priceless treasure map before Buggy the Clown agrees to lead him through the bloody tangle of Blade Trees and Spike Needle Grass that make up Impel Down's Crimson Hell!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and Buggy the Clown could end up as hippo food if they aren't careful in Impel Down's Wild Beast Hell. Of course, the rubber-man might find that a better fate than dealing with the prison's putrid warden!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and his crew stumble upon a most peculiar village when they hitch a ride on a fire-breathing beetle. The natives are petrified of pirates, but they welcome the Straw Hats with open arms!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The citizens of Little East Blue throw in a feast in honor of the Straw Hats, but when the Amigo Pirates try to capture Boss the Beetle, Luffy and his crew will have to defend their new friends.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji prepare to do battle on behalf of Boss the Beetle, but Captain Largo of the Amigo Pirates counters with a deadly arsenal of nets to put the Straw Hat brawlers on lock down!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy kicks into Second Gear for his rematch with Largo, and Nami leads the islanders as they lay waste to the Amigo Pirates. Boss the Beetle may be safe for now, but someone sinister lurks behind the scenes.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy struggles to stay a step ahead of a prison patrol made up of hungry lions and poisonous scorpions! Meanwhile, Ace spends what could be his final hours swapping stories with a pirate who hates pirates.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While the guards struggle to squelch a violent prison uprising, Luffy and his fellow fugitives try to keep their cool in a level of Impel Down known as Starvation Hell!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Boa Hancock uses her ample assets to buy some private time for a clandestine chat with Ace. Meanwhile, Luffy needs help from a graceful friend to escape the jaws of a hungry Sphinx!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and Bon are on the verge of reaching Level 4, but they didn't count on fighting a demonic, lightning-fast, devastatingly powerful Minotaur! To defeat this beast, they'll need help from a human candle and a deranged clown!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy narrowly avoids a deadly dip in the boiling pool of blood, only to find himself face to face with Warden Magellan. Meanwhile, outside the prison walls, the marine fleet prepares for Whitebeard's onslaught!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Warden Magellan is a monster of a man with a penchant for poisoning prisoners. To rescue Ace, Luffy must go toe to toe with this toxic terror, but how do you defeat a foe who's deadly to the touch?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy's daring assault on the venomous warden of Impel Down leaves him struggling to stand up, but despite the lethal poison breaking down his body, the rubber-man kicks his rescue mission into Second Gear!

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: Lawmen Of The Old West

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Mild ‘N Wooly
programme.desc: When an unruly herd of Mareep ruin their lunch plans, our heroes decide to help their timid herder in time to compete in a local battle festival.

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Wired For Battle

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Good ‘Quil Hunting
programme.desc: When Ash finds a Cyndaquil in the wild, he is eager to catch it...but you can bet he’s not the only one!

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: A Shadow Of A Drought
programme.desc: Arriving in Azalea Town, Ash carelessly provokes its residents, who adore SlowPoké. And things only look worse as Team Rocket arrives, meaning to snag every last SlowPoké! What can Ash do?

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Going Apricorn
programme.desc: As he promised Professor Oak, Ash delivers the mysterious GS Ball to a renowned Poké Ball expert. But the fruits of his labor are almost spoiled when Team Rocket bursts onto the scene!

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Gettin’ The Bugs Out
programme.desc: Ash has finally reached the Azalea Gym, but Cyndaquil isn’t quite fired up enough to take on the Gym Leader. As the battle heats up, Ash has to give his all to take on the powerful Bug-type Pokémon!

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: A Farfetch’d Tale
programme.desc: An inexperienced young Trainer has managed to scare off his own Farfetch’d. Our heroes are happy to help him out, but they'll have to find it before Team Rocket does!

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Tricks Of The Trade
programme.desc: At an annual Pokémon trading festival, a young Trainer is looking for a good trade for his Wobbuffet. The Team Rocket trio are looking for opportunities as well, but both sets of Trainers get more than they bargain for!

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: The Fire-Ing Squad!
programme.desc: An unexpected Pokémon firefighting competition reunites our heroes with some old friends, the Squirtle Squad! But they are in desperate need of some leadership, so Ash and Squirtle rejoin the ranks.

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: No Big Woop!
programme.desc: When they stumble upon a preschool for Wooper and an emergency calls the teacher away, our heroes come to the rescue! But, as always, Team Rocket is around the corner and up to no good…

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Tunnel Vision
programme.desc: On the way to Goldenrod City, our heroes are forced to head through a tunnel guarded by angry Onix. To make it more difficult, Team Rocket, Snubbull, and Jigglypuff drop in for a visit…

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Hour Of Houndour
programme.desc: Following a string of mysterious thefts, our heroes discover some Houndour struggling to survive in the wild. To help these thieving Pokémon mend their ways, Ash and friends will first have to earn their trust.

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: The Totodile Duel
programme.desc: Ash and Misty’s rivalry is reignited when they both try to capture a Totodile at the same time. Unable to see whose Poké Ball actually caught it, they decide a battle is the best way to decide Totodile’s new Trainer.

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Hot Matches
programme.desc: When Ash hears of a virtually unbeatable Trainer nearby, he's itching to take on the challenge. But both Brock’s Vulpix and Ash’s Cyndaquil take a beating from her Skarmory, even with their type advantage! How can Ash defeat it?

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Love, Totodile Style
programme.desc: Ash’s Totodile develops a crush on a passing Azumarill, the star performer of a Pokémon circus. When Team Rocket arrives to steal the show, Azumarill’s heart isn't the only thing Totodile has to win!

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Fowl Play
programme.desc: Ash has his sights set on a rare Noctowl with unusual coloring, but this clever Pokémon repeatedly uses Hypnosis to get the better of him! Will Ash be able to catch this Noctowl napping?

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Forrest Grumps

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: The Psychic Sidekicks

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: The Fortune Hunters

programme.title: Pokemon: Johto League Champions

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The Charmed Ones have their hands full, when thanks to a bored Magic School student, they must keep Lord Dyson from killing the infamous Lady Godiva before she can travel back in time and complete her famous ride.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When Paige and Phoebe summon Grams for Chris' Wiccaning, Grams puts a spell on the children to try to end their sibling rivalry, but instead it reverts the sisters back to bickering teenagers.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When Paige encounters Captain Black Jack Cutting, an 18th century pirate in search of the Fountain of Youth, the curse on his life becomes her problem. Meanwhile, Leslie manipulates a contest in order to spend time with Phoebe.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: In an attempt to stop a demon on a murderous rampage upon his human relatives, Paige casts a spell that inadvertently blocks all death, and it's up to the Charmed Ones to make things right, when the Angel of Death wants the mess cleaned up.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A blue moon causes problems right after the Elders', suspicious of Leo, assign the sisters a new whitelighter. Meanwhile, Agent Brody tells Paige of a powerful new threat, and Phoebe and Leslie confess their true feelings for each other.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Norma atrapa a Fernando con una mujer en la cama, él envuelve a Gabriela en otra mentira y pelea con Norma en el balcón desde donde cae por accidente. Concha salva a los Reyes de una emboscada.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Fernando aprovecha su quebranto para manipular a Gabriela y amenaza de muerte a Norma. Franco cree que ella y Sara corren peligro y les recomienda que salgan de la hacienda cuanto antes.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Fernando se aficiona a las apuestas, a Gabriela no le gusta pero acepta bajo presión. Rosario ve a Armando besar a Dínora, él le echa la culpa a ella y se alegra de que su mujer esté celosa.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Fernando trata de violar a Jimena en el campo y Sara se lo impide. Ante las quejas de las Elizondo, Gabriela respalda a su esposo y llama calumniadoras a sus hijas. Rosario acosa a Franco.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez decide to keep Wednesday and Pugsley home from school after Morticia sees the fairy tales they have to read. When the truant officer comes to investigate, he is shocked at what he finds.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia calls a psychiatrist after she fears Pugsley is becoming normal after he abandons his pet octopus for a puppy and is seen wearing a Boy Scout uniform, playing with a baseball bat, and helping an old lady cross the street.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester, who has become lonely, convinces Gomez and Morticia that it is time for him to find a bride. He decides to put an ad in the newspaper, looking for love. But things go awry when a door-to-door saleswoman comes by.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Election fever grips the Addams household, as Gomez (John Astin) supports the council candidate whose campaign promise is to drain the town's disgusting bogs. Morticia (Carolyn Jones), who likes "the lovely bogs," labels the candidate an extremist.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Pugsley and Wednesday start a row at a party when their gift of a tarantula upsets Harold, the birthday boy. Harold's parents insist that the Addams children lack breeding and, therefore, are no longer allowed to play with their son.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: After Pugsley befriends Gorgo, a circus gorilla, Gorgo decides to follow Pugsley and Gomez home, where is accepted as one of the family. But Gorgo gives Morticia's tea guests, the Ladies League members, quite a shock.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A pair of bank robbers are welcomed as Halloween trick-or-treaters by Morticia and Gomez. The creepy atmosphere of the house, Morticia's smoldering holiday punch, and Lurch's ominous presence impel the crooks to abandon their plans.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Lionel Barker, a former suitor of Morticia's, shows up, Gomez is jealous. But he's soon calmed when he learns that Barker is after Mildred, the new maid. The Addamses then discover that Barker is a con man--after Mildred's money, not her love.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Newlyweds move in next door. But the honeymoon loses its tranquility when Uncle Fester enters their house through a tunnel and they flee in terror at the sight of Lurch, Grandmama sharpening her ax, and Morticia and Gomez bathing the octopus.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family faces a crisis when Wednesday packs her spider and runs away (after being scolded for playing with Uncle Fester's TNT). When they try to file a missing person report, a detective is anxious to retire early due to their story.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Official visitors from an unfriendly nation receive the shock of their lives when they decide to exploit the Addams Family as an average uncultured family. The visitors are shaken up by Morticia's carnivorous plants among other things.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's cousin, Melancholia, wants to marry Clarence P. Harvey after most of her marital prospects have joined the Foreign Legion. Clarence recoils when Melancholia puts on a campaign to win him, backed by Morticia, Gomez and Clarence's boss.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes a veritable gazelle when he takes dancing lessons at Gomez and Morticia's suggestion after he admits to being a wallflower at social functions. Each member of the Addams Family teaches Lurch a different step.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama's paintings leave an art critic speechless, so Gomez sends for his friend, Sam Picasso, to teach Grandmama to paint in the abstract. The starving artist ignores Grandmama's and Morticia's work as he eats and paints.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Rockland Cartright III is a beatnik who crashes his motorbike into a tree and recuperates at the Addams house. Each regards the other as an oddity, although the family learns to appreciate certain aspects of Rockland's life.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Mr. Briggs, the postman, is hired by the government to do undercover work in the Addams house. While pretending to be a stamp collector, he investigates rumors that coded radio messages are being sent from the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch's tiny fire-eating mother visits and demands that Lurch's employers wait on her boy hand-and-foot after Lurch leads her to believe that it's his house. Lurch revels in the unexpected attention he gets from Morticia and Gomez.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's electrical output fails abruptly. Should they call a doctor or an electrician to bring Fester back? Morticia prescribes a bowl of porcupine mold, and both she and Gomez agree that long exposure to moon rays would be beneficial.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family would like to vacation on the moon, but the billion-dollar travel cost is slightly prohibitive. Uncle Fester volunteers $21.13 and Morticia, using Gomez's new supercomputer, suggests placing a $2,000 bet on the daily double horse race.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Cousin Itt is advocated as curator of the local zoo. Gomez uses his influence with Park Commissioner Fisk (guest star Alan Reed) to promote Itt for the job, but the zookeepers are convinced the Addamses' cousin should be confined to a cage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama (Blossom Rock) is hauled off to jail for setting up a fortune-telling booth in the Addamses' living room. Gomez (John Astin) volunteers to act as attorney, and the court session becomes a shambles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez (John Astin) loses his memory after hitting his head; he fails to recognize Morticia (Carolyn Jones) and says the house looks like a condemned museum. The Addamses take turns hitting Gomez on the head trying to help him regain his memory.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Thing disappears from his box. Failing to find a single trace of Thing, Gomez (John Astin) conducts an investigation--with all members of the household under suspicion. Also starring Carolyn Jones, Jackie Coogan, and Ted Cassidy.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester applies for a job as an insurance salesman with the same company which is threatening to cancel the Addamses' policy (because Fester keeps blowing things up). Fester convinces the company interviewer that he is qualified for the job.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes inconsolable when Gomez donates the family antique harpsichord to a collector. Gomez and Morticia offer Lurch a balalaika and a set of drums. When this proves unsatisfactory, Gomez and Fester decide to build a new harpsichord.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Morticia hears the stock market has crashed, she assumes that Gomez has been financially wiped out and rallies the family to help make money. Morticia gives lessons, Lurch and Fester run an escort service, and the kids run a poison drink stand.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While enjoying a moonlight picnic and snail hunt, the Addams Family is mistaken for Martians by uniformed investigators from Mysterious Space Objects Headquarters. In turn, Gomez (John Astin) and the clan regard their inquisitors with suspicion.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams struggle to combat the hectic pace of Vietnam and one Team puts their own Race in jeopardy by offering to help the competition.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams scramble to spot royalty in the jam-packed streets of Cambodia and one Team monkeys around and breaks the Race's cardinal rule by losing their passport.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams sweat it out searching sand dunes for water in the blistering sun and one racer decides to help his competition hoping karma will be on their side in the end.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Teams slide six stories into a shark tank and one racer must conquer her fear of heights to make it through this leg of the race.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: One team musters up the courage to reveal a personal secret to the others, and another Racer breaks down in tears as the stress of the Race mounts.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The lack of cooperation hinders one team's efforts at an explosive Detour. Also, during the series' first ever Switchback, Teams return to one of the most infamous Roadblocks in the history of the show.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The racers end up knee-deep in Estonian bogs, and two teams are neck and neck in their race to the pit stop.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Tempers flare when one team goes back on their word and a Team spirals into last place when their taxi is stolen by another Team.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: One team decides to take a four-hour penalty when they're unable to complete a Roadblock, and another team dodges intoxicated locals while trying to complete their Detour.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: A million dollars is at the final three teams' fingertips as they count out a maddening amount of poker chips and race to see Mr. Las Vegas, who holds the final clue to the one million dollar prize.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: Eleven teams take off from Los Angeles, California on race around the world, starting with a stop in Valparaiso, Chile, where a high-wire walk Roadblock tests the mettle of several racers.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The ten remaining teams depart Palacio Baburizza in Valparaiso, Chile, taking a lengthy bus trip to Puerto Varas.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The nine remaining teams depart the Pit Stop at Gruta de la Virgen in Puerto Varas, Chile for Bariloche, Argentina.

programme.title: The Amazing Race
programme.desc: The eight remaining teams depart the Pit Stop at Estancia Fortin Chacabuco in Bariloche, Argentina for Hamburg, Germany.

programme.title: The Joy of Painting with Bob Ross

programme.title: The Good Wife

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Snakes Alive
programme.desc: Jack is counting down his scaliest, slitheriest, snakiest safaris ever. From green anacondas and cobras to eastern diamondbacks, puff adders, taipans and more… this Wild Countdown has teeth!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Meet six exotic species and the habitats they call home sweet home. Corals in Curacao, Galapagos marine iguanas, Borneo’s orangutans, Tasmanian devils, mountain gorillas in Rwanda and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack's comin' home to the Columbus Zoo in Ohio where he gives his grandkids a behind-the-scenes tour. Join in as they learn the ins and outs of zookeeping while meeting amazing animals like elephants, a clouded leopard, and a baby koala.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack as he meets creatures thriving in their tropical island homes, like the Bison of Catalina Island, Flamingos in Curacao, Sea Lions in the Galapagos, along with Bats, Dolphins, and a special island dedicated to Monkeys!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack and Sue head into the state-of-the-art Animal Care Center at Busch Gardens Tampa Bay to assist veterinarians performing an exam on a lion!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: The lush lands of Lope are home to rare and unique creatures like Forest Elephants, Forest Buffalo, and Red River Hogs. Plus loads of primates, and Jack has a close encounter with a gorilla!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Creepiest Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jack as he counts down ten of his creepiest encounters with venomous vipers, huge tarantulas, bats, bugs and a whole lot more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: The watery world of Dominica, one of the Caribbean's most pristine islands, provides Jack and his daughter Kathaleen with an unforgettable island adventure.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: The Atacama Desert in northern Chile is known as the highest and driest desert in the world. Jack wants to explore it all-from colorful flamingos to rare cats and even a newly discovered species.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: After her floatplane touches down on Kulik Lake, Jack's daughter, Kathaleen, joins him in the Katmai region of Alaska for some brown bear watching and fly-fishing.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack as he heads back to his old stomping grounds near Knoxville, Tennessee! He takes his family to his old farm, the Knoxville Zoo, and the University of Tennessee for a special visit with Smokey the Dog.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: After an amazing helicopter trip to the remote location, Jack goes behind-the-scenes at a trout hatchery. Then he and Sue exchange practical jokes while fly-fishing along the Sun River.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack and his family as they trek deep into the jungles of Rwanda and get a close-up look at wild, and extremely endangered, mountain gorillas.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack is heading to Zimbabwe! Just around the corner from majestic Victoria Falls, the folks at Elephant Camp are working to provide a home to orphaned Elephants in need. Jack assists the team in radio collaring a soon-to-be-released female.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he discovers six creatures with supreme senses, like the animal with the most powerful snout, to a creature with razor-sharp eyesight. Crocs, Elephants, Sharks, Bats, Peregrine Falcons and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Meet impressive and iconic species, each representing their home continent, like Asian King Cobras, Australian Kangaroos, African Lions, Antarctica’s Penguins, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack is lending a hand to Shamwari's world-renowned veterinarians and anti-poaching unit as they work on the front lines of conservation in South Africa.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack takes flight in Panama in search of Bats, Birds and other Jungle Creatures! Jack discovers how Bats are vital to Earth's pest control, and learns about one of the coolest adaptations in the animal world – echolocation!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Find out the answers to some of nature’s biggest mysteries! Why do gorillas spend so much time in trees, why do male lions have such shaggy manes, why do jellyfish live upside down? You’ve got questions, and Jungle Jack has the answers!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Picky Eaters
programme.desc: Feast your eyes on six species that take picky eating to the extreme! A panda that brunches on bamboo, marsupials that munch on eucalyptus, flamingoes that savor the flavor of algae, plus many more finicky eaters are on today’s countdown menu.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Rescued
programme.desc: Come along on an amazing adventure with some remarkable animals, like endangered cheetahs, an orphaned wombat, and even a grey whale, that are getting a second chance.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along with the Hanna's as they visit two all-American Arizona zoos. They encounter Elephants, Big Horn Sheep, Rhino, Giant Tortoises and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: In Costa Rica, Jack becomes enthralled with the country's beautiful butterflies, including the Blue Morpho, the “Queen of the Rainforest.”

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack and his wife Sue are in Montana meeting up with some amazing people who are taking animal rescue to whole new level! First, a couple that left big city life to run a ranch dedicated to animals in need.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack as he explores Rwanda's legendary Akagera National Park. The storied landscape is making a comeback, and home to Maasai Giraffe, Hippos, Elephants, Crocodiles, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Living on the Edge
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack Hanna as he counts down the species that live their lives where other creatures fear to tread – right on the edge!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: River Adventures
programme.desc: Get ready to set sail with Jungle Jack for rolling river adventures from Africa to the Amazon! Rivers provide more than drinking water for wildlife- a river can also be a habitat, a hiding place, and even a runway.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A victim usually never foresees danger when the perpetrator turns out to be a friend or a lover. Science and microscopic evidence can unmask these killers and find justice for those who are Loved To Death.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For serial killers, once is never enough. For investigators, the challenge is steep when the killers murder by numbers.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: There are several things that can suggest murder; jealousy, anger, poison…When everyday substances reveal hidden clues that break a homicide case, those substances become the elements of murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: No matter how chaotic or how clean a crime scene appears to be, the culprit is bound to leave something telling behind. Occasionally, it's nothing more than a fingerprint or shoe tread. Sometimes that's all that's needed.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For some killers, murder can be a profitable business. And the scene of the crime can be both a source for clues, and puzzling questions. When a victim has been targeted for death, investigators must look beyond the obvious to uncover a murder for hire.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Sometimes when a death seems to be accidental or the result of a tragic accident, it is up to forensic scientists to reveal the deception lying just below the surface.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When a murder is committed and deceit clouds the evidence, investigators turn to science and technology to uncover the truth and expose a murderous lie and capture the killer.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A woman is found dead at the bottom of the basement stairs. As detectives look into the accident, they begin to question the sequence of events.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The solution to the most heinous crimes often hinge on the smallest of clues. Investigators must have their eyes trained to find the full story of a murder written in a single scrap of evidence.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some people murder for love. But these killers did it for the money. When greed is the motive, investigators must make every clue pay off.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Identifying Burned Remains: It's difficult to have a murder investigation without a body, and burning up the victim is a time-honored method of destroying physical evidence.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Profiles the work of world-renowned forensic experts and the procedures they use to solve murders and other mysteries in minutes or centuries after they happen.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Approximately 1.8 million Americans are reported missing each year. Some are runaways who find their way home, but others simply disappear. When foul play is suspected, investigators turn to forensics to find the missing.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some people will let nothing stand between them and their goals. In their tortured minds, raw desire replaces all reason, and homicide becomes a convenient means to an end.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Three astronauts have returned from this first space flight. Major Gart is hospitalized with a broken leg. The other two, Colonels Harrington and Forbes head for a bar. Harrington gets a strange feeling…

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A two-bit thug thinks he's found the key to a better life in an old sidewalk salesman who has the uncanny ability to tell people what they need the most.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A man who can change his face to resemble others gets into hot water with gangsters.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: With all-out nuclear war about to ignite, a scientist and his pilot friend plot to escape on an experimental spaceship.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Three astronauts crash on what they believe to be an asteroid. Unfortunately they have only limited water supplies to sustain them.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Alone on a cross-country trip, a woman continually sees the same hitch-hiker everywhere she looks.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Tight fisted Franklin Gibbs is not pleased when his wife wins a trip for two to Las Vegas. But things change when he falls under the spell of a slot machine that calls his name.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A World War I flying ace flies through a mysterious cloud - and lands at a modern U.S. air base in the year 1959!

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Lt. Fitzgerald has found his own special wartime hell. Looking into the faces of his men prior to battle, he has the disquieting ability to see who is about to die.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Three astronauts land on what looks like Earth 200 years before they left--only all of the people seem frozen in time.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Millicent Barnes sees her double at a bus terminal.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Paranoia strikes the residents of Maple Street when they believe human-looking aliens have invaded the neighborhood.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Businessman Arthur Curtis discovers that life as he knows it doesn't really exist.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Walter Jameson is an excellent history teacher who talks about the past as if he had lived it.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: When a space exploration crashes on Mars, the surviving passenger is surprised to find that Martians are human-looking, very friendly and apparently just like us...

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Just before being hanged for shooting a man in the back, a man in 1880 is transported into the year 1959 by a professor who soon realizes that he has brought forward a savage killer.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An over-the-hill boxer gets a boost from one of his biggest fans - a little boy with an unwavering belief in magic.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: After being shot to death, Rocky Valentine encounters the amiable white-haired Mr. Pip, who gives Rocky everything he wishes for.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Schoolteacher Helen Foley finds a strange and very serious little girl on the stairs outside her apartment. The little girl seems to know her, and tries to jog her memory about a man she saw earlier that day. The man arrives at Helen's door…

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Riding home on the train one day, a man falls asleep and dreams it is 1880, and he is entering a small town called Willoughby.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A man, desperate to win the affection of a beautiful woman, slips her a love potion. He is overjoyed that the potion works so well...at first.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A trumpet player who's convinced he'll never amount to anything attempts suicide and finds himself in a world where no one can hear or see him.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An eccentric loser gets a new life from his guardian angel, but there is a price to keeping it.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A woman discovers that the floor of a department store, on which she bought a gold thimble, doesn't exist - and that her 'saleslady' is really a mannequin!

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A scientist arranges to have his human-looking robot pitch for the struggling local baseball team.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A playwright makes characters come to life.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A pilot of a downed WW II bomber comes to in the African desert and desperately tries to find out what happened to the rest of his crew.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: A group leaves the prison to search for supplies; the remaining members of the group deal with recent losses.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl and a small group set out on foot in search of medicine, but their mission faces obstacles; Rick and Carol find two uninfected stragglers in a nearby town.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Assorted enemies pressure Rick and the group; the survivors and the prison may reach a breaking point.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Following his defeat at Woodbury, the Governor wanders aimlessly until he encounters a family in need.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: At the camp outside the prison, the addition of new members threatens the peace; something new unfolds as the Governor plans his next move.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Things finally begin to calm at the prison until Rick and the group face imminent danger when the Governor arrives with his forces.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and Carl look for shelter while Rick deals with old wounds; those left at the prison consider whether survival alone will be enough.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Beth remains hopeful, and she and Daryl search for other survivors of the Governor's attack; the now-divided group faces obstacles in their quest for safety.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick faces a number of threats while Carl and Michonne look for supplies; Glenn and Tara meet strangers on an important missio; other group members deal with their pasts.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: In the woods after fleeing the prison, Beth makes a request that sends her and Daryl on an enlightening mission.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl and Beth find shelter while another group has a realization about their own protection; Sasha, Bob and Maggie clash over a search mission.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: After finding and establishing a new shelter, members of the group consider things returning to how they were before; Carol must make a difficult choice.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl struggles to fit in with his new group while Glenn finds Maggie's messages and races to catch up to her.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Many paths collide on each group's travels; Rick remembers the past and faces sheer brutality; the group struggles to survive.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The true motives of the Terminans come to light when Rick and the others end up in a vulnerable situation.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick leads a risky mission for a possible small reward when the supplies run low and the group's mistrust of people grows.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick and the others find themselves pitted against a nasty group but may have a plan to gain the upper hand.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Eugene busca a Stephanie, que desapareció misteriosamente. Connie investiga al soldado Davis. Carol ayuda a Lance a investigar una comunidad que está extorsionando a la Mancomunidad por dinero.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Aaron y Maggie se encuentran a la governadora Pamela Milton mientras recorre Alexandria, Oceanside y Hilltop. Ezekiel tiene suerte durante un control de rutina. Eugene procesa la historia de Max.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie, Lydia y Elijah ayudan a un extraño de otra comunidad llamada Riverbend. Se encuentran con Aaron, quien les cuenta sobre una misión en la que se embarcó con Gabriel como emisarios de la Mancomunidad.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie, Lydia y Elijah ayudan a Aaron y a Gabriel en una misión de rescate. En medio del caos, Negan vigila a Hershel. Sebastian fuerza a Daryl y Rosita a realizar un atraco.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Hornsby obliga a Daryl y a sus tropas a enfrentarse contra Maggie en Hilltop. Tras un angustioso atraco, Rosita consigue que Connie, Kelly, Eugene y Max investiguen a los Milton. Ezekiel ayuda a los pacientes del hospital.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie se prepara para defender Hilltop y a los habitantes de Riverbend frente al ataque de Hornsby. Mientras tanto, éste contrata a Leah para que la mate.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl y Negan se introducen en la Mancomunidad para obligar a Hornsby a que deje de perseguir a sus familias. Pamela enfrenta las protestas de aquellos que están hartos de la impunidad de los crímenes de Sebastian.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Carol y Pamela hacen un trato de borrón y cuenta nueva en nombre de sus amigos. Aaron, Jerry, Lydia y Elijah se marchan hacia Oceanside para hablarles de un plan. La Commonwealth celebra el Día de los Fundadores.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Eugene huye después del incidente del Día de los Fundadores. Pamela le pide a Mercer que investigue dónde está, para disgusto de Max y La Princesa. Por otro lado, Aaron, Jerry, Lydia y Elijah se topan con un contratiempo peculiar.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl y Carol investigan el paradero de sus amigos después de que Pamela los hiciera desaparecer de la Commonwealth. Por desgracia, su única pista es Hornsby. Por otro lado, Pamela le pide a Yumiko que procese a Eugene en nombre de la Commonwealth.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Después de separarse de sus hijos, Maggie, Gabriel y Rosita siguen un convoy militar hasta un destino misterioso. Ezekiel, Kelly, Negan y Annie acaban en una zona de obras. Daryl y Carol siguen a un tren que lleva a Connie a bordo.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Ezekiel y Negan organizan una revuelta clandestina contra los guardianes. Aaron, Jerry, Lydia y Elijah se unen a Luke y a Jules durante su huida a la costa. Además, Eugene es juzgado con el apoyo de Yumiko como abogada defensora.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Los alejandrinos y los prisioneros vuelven a la Commonwealth para enfrentarse a Pamela Milton. Por otro lado, una horda se acerca a la ciudad.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl y Carol llevan a Judith al hospital, mientras que Rosita, Eugene y Gabriel buscan a Coco. Por otro lado, Maggie y Negan se enfrentan a Pamela y los héroes se reúnen para una última batalla.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Rick Grimes, policía de una pequeña localidad de Georgia, despierta de un coma y repentinamente se encuentra en un mundo apocalíptico. Desorientado, en busca de su familia y una explicación a lo acontecido, Rick ha de adaptarse al nuevo orden.

programme.title: James Toney vs Freddie Delgado
programme.desc: On June 18th, 1995 James Toney fought Freddie Delgado at the Performing Arts Theater in New Orleans with the bout ending in the fifth round technical knockout victory for Toney.

programme.title: Miguel Cotto vs Delvin Rodriguez
programme.desc: On October 5th, 2013 Miguel Cotto battled Delvin Rodriguez at the Amway Center in Orlando, Fl. The originally twelve round bout lasted three rounds and ended by technical knockout in third round securing the victory for Cotto.

programme.title: Manny Pacquiao vs David Diaz
programme.desc: On June 28th, 2008 Manny Pacquiao and David Diaz fought eachother at Mandalay Bay Events Center in Las Vegas for the WBC World Lightweight titles with Diaz going down in the ninth round Pacquiao secured his victory.

programme.title: Teofimo Lopez vs Pedro Campa
programme.desc: On August 13th, 2022, Teofimo Lopez fought Pedro Campa for the NABF & WBO International Super Lightweight Titles in Las Vegas. Teofimo looked confident and quick from the start, wearing down Campa until he finally stopped him in the 7th round.

programme.title: Mike Tyson vs Henry Tillman
programme.desc: On June 16th, 1990 Mike Tyson defeated Henry Tillman at Caesars Palace in Las Vegas in a bout supposed to last ten rounds but ended after one in a quick win for Tyson.

programme.title: Jose Zepeda vs Ivan Baranchyk
programme.desc: On October 3rd, 2020 Jose Zepeda faced Ivan Baranchyk in a battle for WBC silver super light weight title at the Bubble at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas with both opponents going down it ended in a victory for Zepeda.

programme.title: Josh Taylor vs Jose Ramirez
programme.desc: On May 22nd, 2021, Josh Taylor fought Jose Ramirez for the undisputed super lightweight title in Las Vegas. With a lot of bad blood going into the fight, Josh Taylor prevailed, winning by a close unanimous decision victory.

programme.title: Mike Tyson vs Lorenzo Canady
programme.desc: On August 15th, 1985 Mike Tyson and Lorenzo Canady fought eachother at Resorts International in Atlantic City that resulted in Tyson defeating Canady in the first round by Knockout.

programme.title: Luis Alberto Lopez vs Gabe Flores
programme.desc: On September 10th, 2021, Luis Alberto Lopez fought Gabe Flores in a super featherweight bout in Tucson. In a surprising upset, Lopez won by a convincing unanimous decision.

programme.title: Juan Manuel Marquez vs Mike Alvarado
programme.desc: On May 17th, 2014, Juan Manuel Marquez fought Mike Alvarado in a WBO Welterweight Title eliminator at The Forum in Inglewood. Both fighters scored a knockdown in the bout, but it was Marquez that prevailed with a unanimous decision victory.

programme.title: Teofimo Lopez vs William Silva
programme.desc: On July 14th, 2018 Teofimo Lopez and William Silva fought for the vacant WBC Continental Americas lightweight titles with Silva going down 3 times Lopez secured the technical knockout win in the sixth round.

programme.title: Miguel Cotto vs Muhammad Abdullaev
programme.desc: On June 11th, 2005 Miguel Cotto faced Muhammad Abdullaev for the WBO World Super Lightweight title at Madison Square Garden in New York the twelve round bout ended in the ninth securing the victory for Cotto.

programme.title: Miguel Cotto vs Ricardo Mayorga
programme.desc: On March 12th, 2011, Miguel Cotto fought Ricardo Mayorga for the World Super Welterweight Championship at the MGM Grand in Las Vegas. In a great fight, Miguel Cotto prevailed, knocking down Mayorga in the final round and getting the stoppage.

programme.title: Ray Mercer vs Bert Cooper
programme.desc: On August 5th, 1990 Ray Mercer faced Bert Cooper for Heavyweight titles at the Convention Hall in Atlantic City with the bout ending by unanimous decision in favor of Mercer.

programme.title: Muhammad Ali vs. Joe Frazier 2
programme.desc: On January 28th, 1974 Muhammad Ali and Joe Frazier face eachother for a second time at Madison Square Garden in New York for North American Boxing Federation Heavyweight titles resulting in a strong win for Ali.

programme.title: Oscar De La Hoya vs Jeff Mayweather
programme.desc: On March 13th, 1993 Oscar De La Hoya and Jeff Mayweather faced eachother at the Hilton Hotel in Las Vegas in an 8 round bout then ended by technical knockout in the fourth round securing the victory for De la Hoya.

programme.title: Julio Cesar Chavez vs Ivan Robinson

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: En route back to Earth, the Autobots are captured and deactivated. Their only chance for survival is an alliance between Smokescreen and a shady alien space captain planning to win big on the Monicus Asteroid, site of the best casino in the universe.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Thought to be extinct, four female Autobots come out of hiding to raid a Decepticon base on Cybertron for Energon Cubes. When their team leader Aleta-1 is captured, Megatron uses her to force Optimus Prime to surrender himself.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: When the city's hottest nightclub, "Dancitron" opens up, its patrons mysteriously start aiding the Decepticons. After his break-dancing crew gets run off by the club's security, Raoul gets some backup from his trusted Autobot friends.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: To aid in their latest scheme, The Decepticons kidnap a scientist. When Autobot Powerglide embarks on a high-altitude mission to save her, they form a bond that will keep his spirits flying high… even in the middle of a Decepticon fight.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: To aid in their latest scheme, The Decepticons kidnap a scientist. When Autobot Powerglide embarks on a high-altitude mission to save her, they form a bond that will keep his spirits flying high... even in the middle of a Decepticon fight.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: It's Decepticon versus Decepticon when triple changers Astrotrain and Blitzwing decide to seize power. Using a molecule-freezing device to take Megatron and Starscream out of the picture, the two are free to lead how they see fit.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: An S.O.S. seeking help from the Autobots arrives from the desperate people of the planet Traal, who have been forced into slave labor by Deceptitron. Seaspray arrives with the Autobots rescue team, and discovers much more than he was planning on.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Part 1 of 2. Megatron creates a powerful strike team, but his Stunticons lack sentience and independent thought. This leads the Decepticons deep into the heart of Cybertron to steal Vector Sigma, the computer that brought life to those on the planet.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Part 2 of 2. Attempting to even the odds against the Stunticons, the Autobots create the Aerialbots to join in the battle against Megatron, who plans to use Vector Sigma to turn the Earth into a metal planet like Cybertron!

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Robots are truly in disguise when the Autobots pose as Stunticons to uncover Megatron's latest plan involving the thefts of some high-profile materials.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: The Autobots participate in a charity road race to watch over an experimental race car—a car made of a special type of material Megatron needs to complete his latest doomsday weapon, a weather-dominating device capable of mass destruction.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: The Autobots participate in a charity road race to watch over an experimental race car - a car made of a special type of material Megatron needs to complete his latest doomsday weapon, a weather-dominating device capable of mass destruction.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Megatron becomes infected with cosmic rust, a metal-consuming plague. When Autobot scientist Perceptor is forced to find a cure for Megatron, the entire Autobot civilization is again put at risk of extinction. But an Autobot invention may save them...

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: After a failed attempt on Megatron's life, Starscream is banished to a deserted island. There he finds the remains of World War II battle vehicles and decides to use them as the basis for his own attack team, the Combaticons.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: United as “Bruticus,” the Combaticons are virtually unstoppable. They plan to pull the Earth into the Sun to eliminate all of their enemies at once. The only hope is for the Autobots and Decepticons to join forces to take Bruticus down!

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Aerialbots Slingshot and Skydive disguise themselves as normal jet fighters to expose a ring of human thieves stealing aircraft. But when they learn that Megatron is behind the scheme, they must combine with the other Aerialbots to convert into Superion!
